string.name: c1_s1
string.value: All right, then.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Good on ya.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sounds like a winner!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: That'd be right.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'm not done hoppin'!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Maybe if you catch me!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: That's pretty nice.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is the kanga-sit.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Kick back and relax!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I've been sitting all day!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I am the sitting master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Plopping down right here.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Here comes the bum!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: That was easy.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm tired of sitting!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Or what?!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Fair enough.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'll take it into consideration.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Why I oughtta...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I'll take you down!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll crack you one good!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I'll just bail outta here!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I didn't mean to.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'll try harder, I promise!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You better take a hike.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Oooh, I'm getting mad!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: That's just mean.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're one cranky croc.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Ah ha!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Time to go fossick.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm really squeezin'!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I don't think I wanna.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Not happenin', mate.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Fertilizer comin' right up!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hope you brought a baggy.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: It's happening!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Who opened their lunch? Me!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Here? I dunno...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: If you insist.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Dropping bombs on command!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Stuff it, ya mongrel!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No, don't think so.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You ocker...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: All righty.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: That's a shonky request.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: We up for tea?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Let's go knock some heads!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Sure thing.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Take it somewhere else!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Not happenin', mate.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No yakka for me today.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Lookin' pretty tall, eh?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Piece of cake.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Ready for a walkabout!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Great, let's get some tucker!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can we take a breather?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Nah, I'd rather nap.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: That's ridiculous.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do that.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: But why?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Not today.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But I'm takin' a sickie!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Rack off!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Let's lair it up!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What are you on about?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No thanks, but no drama.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Maybe later mate?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No comment.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How about no?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Enough with the earbashing!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Leave us alone, will ya?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Put 'er there!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: How about we box instead?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: That sounds gross.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Fair enough.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Let's do it!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Those are some good snuggles.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't be a dill.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: No way!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Get offa me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Get in here!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Just like mum's pouch.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now that's a hug.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Quick, before somebody sees.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: No way, ya dag.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Can we do something else?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: No way, no how.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: That's... Zzzz

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No way, we're still ragin'!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm wide awake.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Let's power nap!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm wired right now!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: No time for that, mate.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Too many dingo nightmares.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Well, um, all right then.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Okie dokie.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Yeah, you're pretty all right.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: That's the good oil!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: You're a right good cobber.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Let's make it happen, mate!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: You're gonna make me chunder.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I'm not feeling the spark.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Get over here!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Hey, buy me dinner first!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Let's give it a burl!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Let's have a little snuggle!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That's just... No.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Cark it!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here it is.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Take it!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: That's a bodger suggestion.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Nah, I'd rather nap.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Are you loony?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Put up your dukes!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Let's have a blue!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Can't we get some food?

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: That's just a stereotype!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I'm a pacificst.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Jab, jab, uppercut!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Get ready for a wallop!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I'm a pacificst.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: I'll lay one on you!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make it quick.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Take a walk, yobbo.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: Not interested.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: Let's do the lip tango!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: Lay one on me.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Tinny me!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: This is getting weird.

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: I don't know about this.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Here I go!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Who needs walking?

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Too right!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: I'm not your telly!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: YOU jump.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Here goes!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Way better than walking!

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: Up, up, up!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: I might sprain an ankle.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: Not into hoppin' today.

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm a beaut!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: I do what I can.

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I'm not really... Into you.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Nah, I'm just a bitzer.

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: Well great.

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Too right, I am!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Stop it with the nonsense.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: All right!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Can't eat another bite.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Well, all right!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Here comes the liquid laugh!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it comin'!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: s2
string.value: All right!

string.name: s3
string.value: Bring it on.

string.name: s4
string.value: Let's do it!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: My legs were hurting...

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I need some rest...

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: No, YOU sit!

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No chair, no deal!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, too...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ahhh... YES.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And... what were you saying?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't speak your language!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Sniff sniff..

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Why me...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Seriously... why me...

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Whatever, foolish one.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Ahhhh... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why not?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What? Huh?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Whatever. Psssh.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Noo... no....

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Lalala!! Lalala!!!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Um... what are you doing?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: ...Uh... what?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c10_f4

string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Fine, if you insist.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Okay, sure.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I got it. Sorry.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: My mistake. I apologize.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is infuriating. Really infuriating.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why the hate? Krarrr!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Cough cough... I apologize.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hoh, I feel terrible now.

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: This is your fault.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Alright. Sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you challenging me? Ludicrous...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Do not say that.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Why the hate?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: That really hurts.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am not stupid.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Apologize, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You are a heartless fool.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Please do not hate me.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: And what's your point?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I need toilet paper now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Ah, what a fantastic dump!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What are you saying...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Who is talking nonsense here?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Excuse me...?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Who's speaking jibberish right now?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Good night. Sleep tight.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.value: You lazy human being.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.value: Where should I sleep today?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.value: Sleep? That's for the weakling.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not tired.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Zzzzzz zzzzzzz zzzzzzz

string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.value: You are lazy.

string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.value: Haha...are you satisfied?

string.value: Awesome, right?

string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.value: Not now. Maybe later.

string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.value: I'm sorry!

string.value: You're a big meanie!

string.value: I'm sorry, master!

string.value: My bad!

string.value: Be nice!

string.value: I didn't mean it!

string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.value: I won't be your scapegoat!

string.name: c7_s4

string.value: That hurts!

string.value: You'll be sorry.

string.value: What did I do?!

string.value: Sorry! Sorry! Sorry!

string.value: Stop it!

string.value: But I love you!

string.value: If I'm misbehaving, it's your fault.

string.value: Is it is because I'm cute?

string.value: You've made me so happy!

string.value: You do?

string.value: Are you sure?

string.value: DO you?

string.value: But I'm stuck in a robot dog body!

string.value: I don't think so...

string.value: You've made me the happiest Roo-bot alive!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so touched!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you, too! I do! I do!

string.value: Not right now!

string.value: Why me?

string.value: I don't think you mean it.

string.value: Did you say something?

string.value: Being with you makes life worthwhile!

string.value: OUF! Hehe!

string.value: About time!

string.value: You got it!

string.value: So... tired...

string.value: Am I cute while I sleep?

string.value: *adorable drool*

string.value: Yay, beauty sleep!

string.value: I'm cute when I sleep, huh?

string.value: Here?! That's just cruel!

string.value: Not right now!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Buy me a cozy bed first!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: There were lots and lots of other Roo-bots back in the lab.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Gelimer wasn't mean, but he wasn't nice, either. I like you better!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Tell me I'm cute! Tell me you'll take care of me!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I was human once, but this robot body is cuter!

string.value: Let's hunt monsters instead!

string.value: My jaw hurts.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Why are you interrogating me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What's your motive?

string.value: I miss the other Roo-bots from the lab. I hope they're okay.

string.value: Before Gelimer made me a Roo-bot, I think I lived by the sea.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Whoa! The world is full of monsters!

string.value: Do you think anybody would miss me if I disappeared?

string.value: What makes you think I have anything worth saying?

string.value: Silence is golden!

string.value: Um, um, um....

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Let me just think of something to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You'll use the Water of Life on me if anything happens, right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, I think I kind of miss Gelimer... How weird!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Why do Balrogs have wings?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Wanna know a secret? You're my favorite!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm not REALLY a dog, you know. I don't talk on command.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm all tired out.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: *Pretends not to hear, because it's funny! Hehe!*

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I refuse! Ask me again?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: So yummy!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: You plan to fatten me up so you can eat me, huh?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: But I'm on a diet!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I can do anything on a full tummy!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Not interested.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I love being pampered!

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Watch it!

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey, I won't say that!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Okay, but you have to keep me safe.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Be on lookout behind me, just in case.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I guess I could take a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Do you have anything to eat while I sit here?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'd rather stand, so I can run if a monster appears.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What if the ground hurts me?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I... I'm too scared.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Hehehehe, like this?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: We should get a TV.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm counting on you to keep the ground from attacking me!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My tail keeps me warm and cozy.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I need to lie down, not sit.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You just want to hurt me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why?! What're you going to do to me?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I... I... I'm too scared!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I guess I'm pretty tired.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Will you be nice to me if I sit?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'll sit next to you!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm awfully tired from being on high alert all the time.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I'm hungry...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Are you trying to hurt me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: It's too cold!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I don't want to sit.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: It was my fault! Please stop hitting me!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Eeeek! Be nice to me!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Why? WHY?!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Sorry! *cry*

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be mad! Please!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: You're scary when you're mad!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll be better! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: But I didn't do anything!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're just like Gelimer!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why are you treating me this way?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: You're making me cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I thought you cared about me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm going to run away!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You're really, really scaring me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You're not being fair!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why do you hate me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're a bully!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I thought we were friends...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... *sniffle*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Waaah! I'm so scared...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: *pitiful sob*

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're so mean! I miss Gelimer!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Don't starve me!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm not s-s-scared of y-you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: There's got to be someone I can call!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You d-do?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: You scare me!!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Go away! Waaah!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You do? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I think... I think that makes me happy!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Sooo happy!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Hehehehe. *blush*

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You scare me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: T-too loud!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Please leave me alone!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love you, too!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That makes me feel safe!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'll b-b-bite you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: T-tell the truth!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I know you d-don't mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so glad I met you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you so, so, so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'd follow you anywhere!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Promise you'll never leave me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: That scares m-me!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're lying, aren't y-you?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Let's talk about this later.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Shhh! I want to hide...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'll try to be brave.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I'll do it for you.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Now I can relax.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I'm too scared!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: That's scary!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: My tummy hurts.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I've been holding that in for a long time.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Promise that it won't hurt me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Will you wipe me? Hehe.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hold my hand, p-please!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Pooping scares me!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What if it bites me on the way out?!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I only do that once a day...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It slipped out! Eeek!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Just a little pellet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: No one's watching, right?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Better out than in!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'd rather play!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I hate the poop monster!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do I have to?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: You have to guard me.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Keep me safe while I rest.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Protect me...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What if I have bad dreams?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm scared to sleep!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Sleep monsters'll get me!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Noooo! Eeeeek!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: My tail will keep me safe. Right?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't leave me alone while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You'll stay with me?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Put your hand on my back while I sleep so I know you're near.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm too scared...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go first. I'll do it after...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What if something sneaks up on me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: No! Don't ask me to do that!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Stay with me while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Red Snail... two Red Snails...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Can you make me a comfy quilt next time?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Let's play!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: There are monsters in the closet!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But I'm not sleepy! I'm not!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That mean scientist performed all sorts of experiments on me. *cry*

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I hate thinking about the past. I hate it!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The outside world is scary, but the lab was even worse.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hate science! I hate it so much!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I don't trust you!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You won't get anything out of me!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't tell you! I won't!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: D-don't hurt me!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I think I was brave before Gelimer came along.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wish I weren't so timid, but everything scares me. Except you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so worried that one day I'll turn into a doll.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes I wish I could fly, but it's too scary.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't like to talk about my past.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You're being too intense!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Did Gelimer send you!?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to taste the Water of Life, but I'm too scared.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes I think I should wear a disguise so no one can find me.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's not safe to have friends. You're the only one I trust.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If it weren't for you, master, I think I'd be completely alone.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Please just leave me alone!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Go away! I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Aah! I thought I heard Gelimer's voice!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I'm too scared to eat!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Food is scary!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I love to eat!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm scared!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Mm, yum!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Is that poisoned?

string.name: s1
string.value: I refuse to say that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Those words are scary!

string.name: s3
string.value: I won't say anything bad, I won't!

string.name: s4
string.value: You're scaring m-me!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat. Now where's my reward?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: What a day! Whew!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I felt like sitting anyway.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Your turn.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Sorry, don't know how.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Nope. Too dirty here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: What's your angle?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Okay. Now what?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ahh, I love how soft my tail is.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh, fine.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I suppose I could rest my feet for a minute.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ask me again. Nicely.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't like it here. Let's jet.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: But I'm hungry!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's dirty here. Let me sit in your lap.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: There's a nice spot next to me with your name on it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Nice view, isn't it?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sure, why not?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Do you expect me to do everything you say?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Come on! Let's do something else!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Dust the ground first, please.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am in no mood to sit.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Fine, fine. I'm sorry.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, okay? Geez.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Oh, come on!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: That was NOT my fault.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fine. Punish me. I LIKE it.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Stop. I'm sorry, okay?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I guess I might've deserved that...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It's not like I meant to do anything wrong.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Ignoring you.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: That's not fair!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Oh, like you're so perfect.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry. You'll forgive me, right?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Sowwie. I'm still cute, see?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Sorry. Won't happen again.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: My bad, my bad. Get over it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking your repressed emotions out on me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What're you gonna do, throw me in a rubbish bin?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were better than that.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Stop nagging!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Please stop hurting me!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I admit it, I messed up.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're so mean!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You're making me cry!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't need your approval.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It wasn't me!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I might behave better if you FED ME MORE.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're enjoying this, aren't you?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I accept your admiration.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Thanks, I guess.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You must want something from me...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I suppose I can buy that.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Well, alrighty then.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Lovin' it.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Do I look that gullible?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: We haven't reached that stage in our relationship.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Too soon, buddy!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You did NOT just say that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I kinda liked hearing you say that.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Aw, back at ya.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say that again while scratching my ears.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You and me both, buddy.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You're cute. Not in a good way.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't say stuff like that before I eat!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Well, this is awkward.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I beg your pardon?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You're gonna make me blush.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Gotta admit, my favorite time of day is when I'm with you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Glad you recognize quality when you see it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I love you too, buddy.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Too little, too late.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Forget that hogwash.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Nope, not into it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Is this really the right time for that?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: That feels wonderful.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poop happens.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Pick it up, buddy of mine!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: No peeking! Well, a little bit is okay.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I thought you were more dignified than that.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I don't need you to tell me when to poop.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You don't even have a bag to pick it up!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You're disgusting!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: All right. Deep breath, and...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I want you to breathe it in. Savor it.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Why are you watching!?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I'd prefer a restroom.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Would you like it if I told YOU when to poop?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Maybe if you fed me more...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'm holding it in, out of spite.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Fine, just a little.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Watch where you step!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: This is kind of awkward.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Avert your eyes!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Feed me and I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: The ground is covered with ants!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm embarrassed to be seen with you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Maybe for a few minutes.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Not a bad idea...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Nite, nite!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm pretty sleepy... How'd you know?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'd really rather not.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do I look sleepy to you?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Maybe if I had a full tummy...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thank you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: How'd you know I was tired?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I suppose I could close my eyes...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My tail is the perfect blanket.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sleeping is my favorite.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Too... hungry...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Here?! Are you kidding me?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't need to sleep.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Tell you what... YOU sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Let's see how long I can stay... *snore*

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'm already sleeping. See?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's space next to me if you wanna cuddle. Just saying.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't sit on me while I sleep!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Despite these dark circles under my eyes, I am NOT sleepy. *yawn*

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have too much to do!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: But I'll have nightmares...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Can't sleep. Miss my mom too... Nevermind.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever see Gelimer again, I'll show him what for!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You have no idea who I really am. Noooo idea.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite time of day is mealtime!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I've always dreamed of riding an airship...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Oh, leave me alone.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't you talk instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo, go over there and play.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: My secrets are my own.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Gelimer thinks he wiped out my memories, but I remember my mother.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I miss my life before I was a Roo-bot. Not that I don't enjoy being with you...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: People think they can walk all over me because I'm in a dog's body.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't let anyone stop me from doing what I want to do!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Less talk, more food!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can talk to?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I've got nothing to say right now.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Conversation isn't my strong suit.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Strangers always touch my tail without asking. I should do it back.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I know I come off kinda mean, but I really just want a friend...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My mother had the kindest eyes. And she used to sing me to sleep.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My most secret dream is to find my mother again, but that's impossible.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Actions speak louder then words.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: But it's naptime!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Nuh-uh. I refuse.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: I suppose I could eat.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What's your motive?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Mmm, mmm! I love it!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: No, thanks.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Eating makes life worthwhile.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: What crazy scheme are you up to?

string.value: Delicious! Thanks!

string.value: Not right now.

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you trying to get me in trouble?

string.name: s3
string.value: Come on, we're better than that!

string.name: s4
string.value: Just... no.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Stomp stomp!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: I'm sitting down!

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Here I am, sitting down.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: Maybe you should speak gorilla.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Whatever the master says!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I was getting tired...perfect timing!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Master, sit down with me!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Input error! Beep!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Click...click...can't you see me walking?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Why don't YOU sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, what did I do...?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master, you're stupid too!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Input error!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Beep beep! Stomp stomp!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Why did you say that...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry master!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Um... right...

string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Don't scold me, master...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Get away from me!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I love you too!!!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I know I'm quite lovable.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Me? Why?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Fine, I'll accept your love!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you too master!!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Roar! I just talked!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Nice weather!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I want some bananas.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Buy me some bananas.

string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: How rude...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: "Talk"... is that good enough?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Roar Roar! Enough?

string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.value: Roar! Let's go!

string.name: c16_s2

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Let's go!!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: On we go!

string.value: I feel sleepy.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: This is it for today.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Sorry, I couldn't hear you.

string.value: Okay, shall we start now?

string.value: If you're ready, let's go!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Follow me!!!!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.value: It's still in the afternoon.

string.value: Great job today! Sleep tight!

string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night, master! Sweet dreams!

string.name: c21_s4

string.value: I feel great right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.value: Roar! Like this change?

string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.value: This is too easy.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Here we go!

string.value: So tired.

string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.value: Change? What's that?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f3

Have you seen my bananas?

string.value: Stop it!

string.value: Can you stop being irritating?

string.value: Stop this right now!

string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.value: Good good good!

string.value: I like you very much also!

string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.value: Are you dying?

string.value: You should reconsider...

string.value: I don't believe you.

string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm happy!

string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're such an awesome master...

string.value: Ahem. Don't do that.

string.name: c12_f3

string.name: c12_f4

string.value: You've humiliated me!

string.value: This isn't it...
