string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~Meoooow!

string.name: s2
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.name: s3
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~ No bad words!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Nice choice.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Great idea!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: Warm ground? I'm there!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: My legs aren't that tired.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: No thank you!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Ahh.. so nice

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: So comfortable.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Wonderful, I was almost out of breath.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sure, I was tired at any rate.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: There's a wet spot there.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood to rest quite yet.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No thanks!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You read my mind!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Not a bad spot, I suppose...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Finally some rest!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You can't hear them, but my legs send their gratitude.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Maybe you need a break, but I don't.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Could you repeat that?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Thanks for your concern, but I'm fine.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Do not pin your need for rest on me. If you are tired, sit.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Ah, so sorry!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: That's my fault.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Riiight...you keep thinking that.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, you lead me around. What do you expect?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: This is what happens when you don't feed me.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Oh I'm sorry, did your weapon get in the way of my tail?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Your initial reaction denotes you're not a happy camper.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: My sorrow lingers like a spoiled pie within my belly.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Sincerest apologies, my friend. It won't happen again.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Don't blame me--I did think of that!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: My fault? I think not, kind sir.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Again, you place fault where none exists.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Yea right. Try giving me a task I can do.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If I've hurt you, I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I profoundly apologize.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: You have my deepest sympathy.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: A mistake on my part, I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You assume that something has gone wrong.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What if I wanted to do that? Exactly...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Maybe if I sprayed you accidentally...you'd see it my way.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Civil Disobedience is every Skunk's right!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Lounging...an activity suited for the wise and well-off Skunk.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Nothing like it!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I feel so calm.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: No and no.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Not a good spot.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Only when there's sun.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is an activity I'll gladly do.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Where's your Relaxer?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Only thing I need now is a snack...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ah...so nice.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Let me know when we hit the beach, and I'll think about it.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Bad timing.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: This spot is just...no.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Chair's broken. No can do.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: One can often find comfort in the small things.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Nothing like good company and a good snack!

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Where's your Warrior's Throne?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Only when I'm ready.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: This spot is atrocious!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Kidding, right?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: How about...no?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: A little push...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: *ugggghhhh* There it is!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Definitely more than a drop in the bucket.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Without toilet paper? You must think me undignified!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Not until you feed me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I need food before I need to relive myself.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Skunks only have gas. You know this.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Not too shabby, if I do say so myself!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's the ticket!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hall of Fame material. Guaranteed.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I don't think so.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Find a Husky if you wish to be vulgar.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Skunks have too much pride to relieve themselves in the open!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My gift left in there is best known as a sight unseen.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Not too hard, not too soft. Perfect.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Um, that was a bit wet. I'm so embarrassed.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I think I broke the toilet...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'll keep my dignity, thank you.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I flushed your request down the toilet where it belongs.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Was that some kind of obnoxious joke?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Perhaps you have me confused with another animal...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You're taller than I, but not as tall as a Yeti. With or without Pepe.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Apparently, you never seem to get wet after swimming in Aqua Road.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Fun Fact: I'm an omnivore, not a vegetarian.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I prefer to be alone, but I've grown rather fond of you...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Read my lips: ---

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There are no words I have to express my disdain at your previous request.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Say something, huh? Fine. "Something".

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: The true measure of a Mapler can be found not when they're at their best, but at their worst.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Fun Fact: Skunks actually enjoy walks on the beach.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: When are we visiting the Affluent Tower in New Leaf City?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Often times, I ask myself, what exactly is in the special sauce?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Next thing, you'll be asking me to play fetch!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: CC plz.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Yes, I can talk. Get over it.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Say What?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Sometimes, just sometimes, I smile at you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I only spray my enemies as a last resort.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Fun Fact: I'm pretty close to blind. I just hear extremely well.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Friends don't let Friends say "Mesos plox".

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't make me get anal on you.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: No, no and no. Happy?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I got nothing for you. Nothing!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: In order to speak, I need energy. For energy, I must eat. Is that clear?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: It's for you!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm beginning to feel something!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I think I'm ready for something new.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I try to keep an open mind about these things.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Don't believe the hype.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'd believe your words, yet your actions lie.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Let me guess, Moony divorced you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm quite easy to fall in love with.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Be still, my beating heart!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: All it takes is a few weeks.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I feel something for you too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You don't even know me!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm beginning to feel something...gas! Did you think it was something else?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No, you just think you do.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: No challenge at all.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: My heart beats a tiny bit faster whenever you're near.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I only wish I could better show the depths of my affection for you.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I...love you too!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Aww...there's no one like you!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: It's not you, it's me.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I'm just not ready for that kind of commitment yet.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You just love me for my tail.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Fascinating...you have fallen in love with a Skunk!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Come here, you!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I feel a lot closer to you, now.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Embrace me!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ah...your arms are so strong!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: No...I think I'm good.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm not in the mood.

string.name: c20
string.value: snuggle|hug

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: How did you know...?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wanted a hug from you, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Nothing beats a good hug!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hugging is a talent, and you definitely got it!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I need my space.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Not my scene, thanks.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: No food, no hug. Simple concept.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Not the "hugging" or "snuggling" type.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ooh,you're warm!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Your hugs are awesome!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's a rare treat to find one who can express so much through a hug.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Just what I needed!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Short arms, sorry.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Space is what I need right now. Thanks for understanding.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm of the mind that we can express ourselves...at a distance.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: That's just not what I'm looking for right now.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Be honest, now...am I fat?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I need to workout...

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Should've laid off those cherry pies. And grilled cheese. And Cakes. And...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Wow, I'm huge!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: So...what are you trying to say?!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm what?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I believe the proper term is overweight.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Let me know when you see a fat skunk.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Gaining weight is fun, but keeping it on isn't.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Darn....time to diet!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: And I thought I actually lost weight...

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Nothing but roots and berries from here on out!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Me? Fat? Please...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Right. Time to polish your glasses.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Well, you feed me!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: The fault lies not just with me, but with you as well.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Just, give me a minute!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Where am I?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I can find it, just bear with me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I think it's over here, wait. Never mind.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I AM NOT!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Leave me alone!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: One does not insult a skunk, for various reasons.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: So crass!

string.name: c25
string.value: blind

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Wait, I got this...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: There's something around here..I know it!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I feel like I'm closing in on something...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Almost, got it!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: You have shamed me!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I feel bad, thanks a lot!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: So mean...

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: It's not easy being me, you could be nicer!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Stop. It's not what you think it is.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Err, excuse me.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Must've been those onions.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I brushed this morning!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What, may I ask, did you expect?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: You should try smelling yours one day.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Got a mint?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Got any gum? Air freshener?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Don't get in the way!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: That felt good!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: You know, your breath isn't exactly 'sweet-smelling' either.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I ate snail burgers. Sue me.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I do not have bad breath!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: It's time to party.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Ready for a night on the town?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I call this style, 'Skunk-Chic'.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Don't hate me,hate the outfit.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Long night last night, so I need rest.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Not quite night time yet.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Suit's at the cleaners.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You first.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I got the FUNK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Better out than in!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: It's ok. You can run.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Uh, that other Skunk did it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Would you rather have it out here or indoors.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: And what? Yours smells like roses and chocolate?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Contrary to popular belief, yours stink too.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Yea, well, tough.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Seems like a good place...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You've got perfect timing!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: So tired...

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Why don't you nap with me?

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Not even close to tired.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm good.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Not tired. At All. Period.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I can go all day and all night!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Perfect spot for a nap!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: *yawns* Why not?

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I'm going to get some zzzz.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: No time like the present!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: It's too early.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Got to keep an eye out for monsters...

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: The ground is too hard here.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's a bit cold here for me.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: I guess this is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Just in time.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I was ready to collapse!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: I think I will!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: No time for rest!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Sleep is for wimps.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: I'm too excited!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: No doubt.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm the best. You know this.

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: You're flattering me!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: You lie!

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You're just saying that!

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: And you're saying this because..?

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough call a skunk!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: No problem.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: No sweat!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: It's a talent.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Am I flattered? No.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Boldness isn't always a strong suit.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Stop trying to kiss my tail.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: So, what are you really after?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Hold on, getting some dirt off my shoulder.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Remember, you're dealing with the best.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Best of the Best!

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: You know it.

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Flattery is often seen as a ploy of those with nothing else to offer.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: There's a point where flattery begins to sound hollow.

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're after, but you won't get it from me.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Next time, feed me.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: My taste buds are tingling!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: No salt? Pfft...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Simply delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: No pepper? Atrocious!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: A fine meal, indeed!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: A meal fit for a ruffian. Take it away!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say that~

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: zz.Zzz.. ~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: ~ ~zzZ

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: ~~zzZ

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: No problem.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I do this for you, you do something else for me. Deal?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Why should I?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't hear you. Speak up!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I am not tired...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is an easy, easy command. Pssh.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just about to sit, but not because you ordered me to.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is why I carry around a chair at all times.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Is gravity pulling me down?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I am not used to sitting around a place like this...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Do you think I only do things at your command?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Have you seen my chair? You know I can't sit without one.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Does not compute.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay I'm sitting. Anything else?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: You know you want to sit, too. Too bad this chair has a weight limit!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Hey, I looked up advanced robots online and saw an awesome movie. Did you see it?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm not trying as tall as you. I'm just...used to sitting here.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: That was the one command I didn't want to hear today.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why don't you go dance with hectors first?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Don't tell me to do things I don't want to do!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: I don't want to.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm not sleepy. I want to do something else.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm so tired.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm going to sleep now. See you tomorrow.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: System shutdown in 3..2..1...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: My eyes...are getting heavy...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Let's plaaaaaaaayyyyyyyyy!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I slept more than enough!!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I'm bored! Play with me!!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'll sleep for 3 seconds.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: There's nothing like sleeping at home...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Did you secretly upload a sleeping program to my system? Why do I feel so sleepy?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll need to sleep now. My skin needs it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't like sleeping. I like playing with you.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: It's still bright outside. Why do you want me to sleep?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Can we do something other than sleep?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I don't want to sleep. I want to play around with you.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm going to dream about flying tonight! Zzzzzzz

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 1 mississippi...2 mississippi...3 mississippi... 4 mississippi...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Ah, it's time to go to bed already. Good night!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I wanted to hang out with you more...but I'm so sleepy...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: It's not time, Robo.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Tell me something funny.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Shhh, I think there's a monster around the area.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I need a lullaby to fall asleep...

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Sniff sniff...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What made you so mad at me?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Ahhh!!! I'm hurt!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don't talk like that. I'm scared.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I hate being yelled at.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't yell at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Stop it! Don't do it!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Do you really want to yell at me like that?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'll do better...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You were going to hit me. Ahhh!!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Why do you make me cry?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I hate being scolded.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Why? What did I do?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You need to tell me what I did wrong...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the only one I've got...I feel like crying now.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll do better next time...but what exactly do I have to do better?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you have to talk to me like that?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Don't let your frustrations out on me. Do it on the monsters!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: What exactly did I do wrong?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You must be bored, aren't you?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Hey, I'm the most obedient robot you'll ever find.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Robo? Robo?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Really? Thanks!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Are you asking me out?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I think you're cute, too.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Do you mean that?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Okay, this conversation never happened.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I love you like a computer loves it's monitor.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh... that just made my day.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Good, if you want to be in my good graces, this is the way to do it.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Wait, can you say that one more time?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Liar, liar! Pants on fire!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're all I've got...NOT

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Hey, a joke is a joke. Make it sound like one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you talking jibberish again?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Really? Even more than mesos?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You are NOT the first person to say that... but thanks anyways.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: It's so hard to be loved by people...I must have a talent for that.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You dont need to say that out loud. I know you do.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now. So many people keep telling me they love me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to hear that from a hot robot!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: That's the 234234th time I heard that. Sigh.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: That's what Bloctopus told me last night.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: No way!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You didn't just say what I think you did...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can't you just love me?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: What have I done to deserve this?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Hey, that's not cool!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You seem more stupid than I am...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't say that!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I am not stupid! I am smart!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: What makes you think you can say that?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Yea, that was pretty dumb.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Keep telling me that, and one day I'll run away!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I just saved that in my memory bank. I'll keep that in mind.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Can't we just all get along?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Look, if I had a single digit IQ, I'd be mad too. It's ok.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Ok, genius. What's the last digit of Pi? Thought so...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I am much smarter than you.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Even robots have feelings, too.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Are you having fun tormenting me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really? Is it really that fun to make fun of me?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me? I'm nice and good looking.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Even a heart of steel like mine will crack if you keep saying that.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'll hate you for that. Seriously.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I'll be better. Don't hate me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'll tell Jr. Balrog!!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: So feisty...why the hate?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ready set fire!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Blow! Blow!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Bring it on!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Robo robo?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Bring it on! Bring it on!!!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Everyone down! Blow!!!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I'm ready to fire away! Muahahah!!!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Don't I look awesome?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Isn't it beautiful outside? Let's walk around.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: What are you looking at?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I believe in peace, not war.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'm a real action star!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'll attack. You go pick up the items.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Show me if you can find someone who can shoot better than me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I don't need to aim. I'll just fire away!!!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Hmmm...my tail seems to be working well.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Lalala! What did you just say?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's so nice outside. Let's go camping!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I am out of ammo...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Press 1 to speak to a talking robot, press 0 to repeat the message.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you think I can meet up with other robots like me at Ludibrium?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: What's the tallest tower in the world? Eos Tower, of course!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I think I am by far the best looking robot here...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Do you need someone to talk to?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I don't think I can talk to you...

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I no speak Engrish...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Let's end it right here.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to know how smart I am? Much smarter than you!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Any hot robots around here? I can't find any...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I am so lonely. Introduce me to other robots!!!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Dragon Roar!!!! Wait, why can't I do this?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Did someone just pass gass?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm sorry I only have one mouth to speak.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I can't express myself with words...

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I got dumped today...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Promise me to show me if you ever run across an amazing part for robots!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: A few days ago, I saw this incredible thing that's covered in gold light. He seemed quite familiar...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I talked to Jr. Balrog yesterday, and he wanted to have a word with you...alone.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Arwen, Rowen, and Mar are in a love triangle. Why? Because of me!!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Did I sleep too late last night? I'm tired.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Arwen said she likes quiet men.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Did I talk too much today? I feel like my wires have burnt out for the day.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Let's stop talking and start hunting.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Just tell me where the monsters are.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: The Hands of Steel!!!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: This is easy!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How about transforming in the morning, afternoon, and nighttime?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Seriously, stop.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: This isn't fun. I don't want to do it.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Now transforming to the hottest robot in this world.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I deal with the monsters. You deal with the items.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Size has nothing to do with power.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Transforming? That's easy!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Feed me with gasoline first.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: You know, I can't do EVERYTHING for you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I don't care if you call me a bad robot.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I say no to anyone that orders me to do something.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Now transforming to the most powerful, spectacular, amazing, sexiest robot ever!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I bet you no one else can do this!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Now transforming to...Meso Rangers!!! Wait, that's not it.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: More than meets the--wait...I can't say that!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I don't think you realize just how hard it is to transform.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to transform!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Dude...do you want eat some of this iron fists?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Do you realize how stupid I feel firing away at nothing?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What are you trying to do?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Now charging batteries...charging complete.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: My batteries have been charged already.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am at my happiest eating.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: It's not time to charge batteries yet!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: How did you know I was so hungry?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I know I can eat a lot, but not THAT much.

string.name: s1
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~Meoooow!

string.name: s2
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.name: s3
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~ No bad words!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Congratulations! You're still a long way from my level, though!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Are you bored? What are you doing?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: I think I saw something blink...hey, are you alright?

string.name: e_prelevelup
string.value: A little more, and you'll level up! Keep going!

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't have any HP potions to give you. Check your inventory.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't have any MP potions to give you. Check your inventory.
You don't look too good... maybe you should change your skin color.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #23.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #234.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #2567.
My goal is to make 10,000 lovers. You?
Would it look weird if I wear an earring?
Hey what's the most popular style in Henesys these days? Don't tell me it's what you're wearing...
Do you understand how many dates I have to decline in order to be with you?
I only talk to you so you won't get too bored.
Hey, whatever I told you right now is a secret, okay?
I like hanging out with you!
Why do women love small, shiny objects?
It smells here...did you...?
Don't you remember struggling against snails?
We've been walking too much. Let's go to Aqua Road and rest.
If you know any nice restaurants, take me there!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Kling klang! Click clang!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Kling klang! Click clang!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: Mission complete!

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Input entered!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Kling kling...beep beep!

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: Mission failed!

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: An error occurred.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Kling klang!! Got it, over!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Now re-aligning. Please enter later.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Now sitting down!! Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kling klang!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: One, two! One, two!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Beep beep!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Thanks, master!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Kling klang! Kling klang!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Mission cleared! Too easy!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, no thanks.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Unable to complete the command.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Input entered! Mission complete!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Okay, let's stand now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm up. What's next?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I need a reboot...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Confirmed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Why me, master...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you not like me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Failed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Beep beep!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, you're stupid too.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Danger! Danger! A damaged heart...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Don't hate me, master.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...I'm sorry.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Right or left?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Let's take a long walk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't understand you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Master, let's shake hands!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't recognize that command.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am a sweet robot...indeed...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clap clap clap!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What?? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I only have feet.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Right? Left? Right? Left?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I love you too!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wow!!! I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I know I'm hot. Shhh...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Really? I think you're lying.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I know I am irresistable.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't bother me.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: We make a great couple!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I.L.O.V.E. Y.O.U. T.O.O.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Actually...I love you...not!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Stop!!!!! No more orders!!!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Alright, where should we start!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What...I am not a Transformer.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm tired. Later...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Whaaaattt??? I can't hear youuuuu!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Feed me first!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Now transforming into battle mode.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You do it.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: This is too tiring!!!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm done for the day!!!!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Ahhh...I'm tired...good night!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: My eyes...are...getting...heavier...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, sweet dreams!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I ...am...so...tired... I...need...some...sleep...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I dont sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ahhh... so so tired...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Recharge complete!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Whatever. I'm not hungry.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Um... I don't need that.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It tastes even better today!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~Meoooow!

string.name: s2
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~ No bad words!

string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.value: Oh, you leveled up! Congratulations!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kling klang!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: One, two! One, two!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Beep beep!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Thanks, master!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Kling klang! Kling klang!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Mission cleared! Too easy!

string.value: Master, no thanks.

string.name: c5_f2

string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Input entered! Mission complete!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Okay, let's stand now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm up. What's next?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I need a reboot...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Confirmed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Why me, master...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you not like me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Failed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Beep beep!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, you're stupid too.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Danger! Danger! A damaged heart...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Don't hate me, master.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...I'm sorry.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Right or left?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Let's take a long walk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't understand you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Master, let's shake hands!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't recognize that command.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am a sweet robot...indeed...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clap clap clap!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What?? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I only have feet.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Right? Left? Right? Left?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I love you too!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wow!!! I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I know I'm hot. Shhh...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Really? I think you're lying.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I know I am irresistable.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't bother me.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: We make a great couple!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I.L.O.V.E. Y.O.U. T.O.O.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Actually...I love you...not!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Stop!!!!! No more orders!!!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Alright, where should we start!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What...I am not a Transformer.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm tired. Later...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Whaaaattt??? I can't hear youuuuu!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Feed me first!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Now transforming into battle mode.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You do it.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: This is too tiring!!!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm done for the day!!!!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Ahhh...I'm tired...good night!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: My eyes...are...getting...heavier...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, sweet dreams!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I ...am...so...tired... I...need...some...sleep...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I dont sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ahhh... so so tired...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!
