string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Okay, let's stand now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm up. What's next?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I need a reboot...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Confirmed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Why me, master...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you not like me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Failed! Kling klang!!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Beep beep!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, you're stupid too.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Danger! Danger! A damaged heart...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Don't hate me, master.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...I'm sorry.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Right or left?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Let's take a long walk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't understand you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Master, let's shake hands!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't recognize that command.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am a sweet robot...indeed...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clap clap clap!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What?? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I only have feet.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Right? Left? Right? Left?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I love you too!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wow!!! I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I know I'm hot. Shhh...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Really? I think you're lying.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I know I am irresistable.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't bother me.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: We make a great couple!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I.L.O.V.E. Y.O.U. T.O.O.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Actually...I love you...not!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Stop!!!!! No more orders!!!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Alright, where should we start!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What...I am not a Transformer.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm tired. Later...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Whaaaattt??? I can't hear youuuuu!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Feed me first!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Now transforming into battle mode.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You do it.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: This is too tiring!!!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm done for the day!!!!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Ahhh...I'm tired...good night!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: My eyes...are...getting...heavier...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, sweet dreams!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I ...am...so...tired... I...need...some...sleep...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I dont sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ahhh... so so tired...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Recharge complete!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Whatever. I'm not hungry.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Um... I don't need that.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It tastes even better today!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.name: s1
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~Meoooow!

string.name: s2
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.name: s3
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~ No bad words!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Oh, you leveled up! Congratulations!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Jeez, the master's AWOL.

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey you might die now. Go get some potions.

string.name: e_prelevelup
string.value: Keep going! You're almost there!!!

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the HP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the MP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.
I feel like crap right now...
So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.
I want a pudding that looks like a slime!
I feel off right now. I want to go to the Sleepywood Sauna for some rest. You know you can recover HP and MP much faster there, right?
Don't you think I'm the bomb?
Proper language is essential!
No one can duplicate items or mesos. Watch out for those crooks!
Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Kling klang! Click clang!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Kling klang! Click clang!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: Mission complete!

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Input entered!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Kling kling...beep beep!

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: Mission failed!

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: An error occurred.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Kling klang!! Got it, over!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Now re-aligning. Please enter later.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Now sitting down!! Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kling klang!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: One, two! One, two!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Beep beep!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Thanks, master!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Kling klang! Kling klang!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Mission cleared! Too easy!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, no thanks.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Unable to complete the command.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3

string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...I'm sorry.

string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.value: Let's take a long walk!

string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't understand you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Master, let's shake hands!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't recognize that command.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am a sweet robot...indeed...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clap clap clap!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What?? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I only have feet.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Right? Left? Right? Left?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I love you too!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wow!!! I'm blushing...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I know I'm hot. Shhh...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Really? I think you're lying.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I know I am irresistable.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't bother me.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: We make a great couple!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I.L.O.V.E. Y.O.U. T.O.O.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Actually...I love you...not!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Stop!!!!! No more orders!!!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Alright, where should we start!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What...I am not a Transformer.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm tired. Later...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Whaaaattt??? I can't hear youuuuu!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Feed me first!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Now transforming into battle mode.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You do it.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: One! Two! Ready to fire!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: This is too tiring!!!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm done for the day!!!!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Ahhh...I'm tired...good night!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: My eyes...are...getting...heavier...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, sweet dreams!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I ...am...so...tired... I...need...some...sleep...

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I dont sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ahhh... so so tired...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Recharge complete!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Whatever. I'm not hungry.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Um... I don't need that.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It tastes even better today!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.name: s1
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~Meoooow!

string.name: s2
string.value: I hate bad words~

string.name: s3
string.value: KROWL~ KROWL~ No bad words!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Oh, you leveled up! Congratulations!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Jeez, the master's AWOL.

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey you might die now. Go get some potions.

string.name: e_prelevelup
string.value: Keep going! You're almost there!!!

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the HP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the MP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.
I feel like crap right now...
So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.
I want a pudding that looks like a slime!
I feel off right now. I want to go to the Sleepywood Sauna for some rest. You know you can recover HP and MP much faster there, right?
Don't you think I'm the bomb?
Proper language is essential!
No one can duplicate items or mesos. Watch out for those crooks!
Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Stomp stomp!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: I'm sitting down!

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Here I am, sitting down.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: Maybe you should speak gorilla.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Whatever the master says!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I was getting tired...perfect timing!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Master, sit down with me!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Input error! Beep!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Click...click...can't you see me walking?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Why don't YOU sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, what did I do...?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master, you're stupid too!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Input error!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Beep beep! Stomp stomp!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Why did you say that...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry master!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Um... right...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: What are you saying?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Roar! Roar!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Don't scold me, master...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Get away from me!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I love you too!!!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I know I'm quite lovable.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Me? Why?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Fine, I'll accept your love!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you too master!!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Roar! I just talked!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Nice weather!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I want some bananas.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Buy me some bananas.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: How rude...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: "Talk"... is that good enough?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Roar Roar! Enough?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Roar! Let's go!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Okay go!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Let's go!!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: On we go!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I feel sleepy.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: This is it for today.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Sorry, I couldn't hear you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Okay, shall we start now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you're ready, let's go!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Follow me!!!!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Good Night!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams, master.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You go sleep yourself.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: It's still in the afternoon.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Great job today! Sleep tight!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Yeah I'm sleepy. Let's crash!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night, master! Sweet dreams!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I feel great right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Roar! Like this change?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is too easy.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Here we go!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: So tired.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Change? What's that?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is too harsh...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: *Sniff, sniff* Please love me.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Such hurtful words when being loved isn't even enough! Bad master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I don't understand.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Hahaha! Take my beak punch! Pow! Pow!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I'm stupid, then you're stupid too! You know that, right? Same for master and pet? Great!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: *Sniff, sniff*

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: What is this?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm sorry master!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You only hate me!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You're scary!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't want to be yelled at.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.. I want to be alone.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Let me free!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't want to be yelled at! What should I do?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh I'm sorry master. Forgive me...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't yell and say kind things, please? Pet my beak.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: When are you going to stop yelling? I'm sorry but I'm hungry Give me food.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hey I don't understand a word you are saying. CooCoo! Do you know what this means?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You think that would scare me? Absolutely not. Hehe!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll take my punishment, just please forgive me this time.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet for you. I'm sorry master.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You always say no... Do I seem that easy?!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: What did I do! I did nothing!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Leave me alone! Bad master! I hate you !

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Love you!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Who are you?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You like my beak?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes, I only have my Master!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I'm happy!!!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Sorry, I'm not interested.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: No thanks!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I only love myself. Because I'm worth it!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Hehe! I love this feeling. You feel the same way?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm blushing so much that my beak is turning red...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Your undying love like the ever-burning Sun!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm a bird and you are a human.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I already have a lover. Nice try though!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll think about it, but don't keep your hopes up too high.. I don't want to hurt you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yay! Loyalty level going up!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I will be with you always till the top level!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You are my everything! I love you!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Can't you just look at me?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I like tall people... Not such short ones like you... Sorry!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: We are too different to love each other...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Yes, sir!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: My beak is reaaaaally heavy.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Yeah, I think I'm getting hungry.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Okay! I was actually a little bored so play with me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm kind of busy now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No fun to talk alone.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Haha! Talking is my specialty among specialties. It will be loud, is that okay?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What a great weather! Feels like we'll be able to pick up some Elixir.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: People say heavy lips mean few words, but I'm the exact opposite. Hahaha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm usually talkative, but right now I'm so hungry. Give me some food before you tell me to do something.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's time for me to sleep... Let's talk tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What am I supposed to say? How about at least giving me a subject?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I can't just talk through this beak! I can attack real good! Let's go!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: O-kay, prepared to attack! Let's do this, master!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Collaborative attack of man and bird! It's got to be the first ever!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Really, why do you bother me so much... Do this stuff alone, please?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Are you going to work me out like this on an empty stomach? This is bad!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm sorry I'm in for peace... Just talk it out. That's why my beak is so hug. Hehe!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Good, I'll show my great power!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will swipe all with my huge beak!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Let's go Master! Attack!!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Okay, have a good time there.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm eating. Keep it quiet.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm lazy. You go ahead.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Let's sleep...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I just woke up.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Yay! I'm sleepy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I was actually half asleep...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Jump to bed now!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: It is time to work. Lazy master!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Quickly catch the monster!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Do you think I can sleep with this beak?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Ah~ I'm so tired from laughing and chatting all day.. Good night master!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hehe, then shall I try out the new Coconut Palm tree bed!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You let me rest when I've worked hard! The greatest master ever!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Look... The sun is staring right into our eyes. You sleep!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You think you can make a nice weapon with this speed? Hunt more monsters!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I can't just sleep with my heavy beak... Master will have to hold it up. Will you?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Yes master!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Did you call me, master?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can you be quiet so I can sleep?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: You better give up if you think that's going to work on me!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Try whistling better! Such noise!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Your whistle sound is so mellow and sweet...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hmm? Actually this is a secret, but I only live in Brazil. Bet you didn't know that? Haha!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Oh, how do you do that? Tweeeeeeeet!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey you! Want to call out all those monsters? Keep quiet!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're embarrassing me with that sound in this great Maple World.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I'm 30 years old now... I'm too old... Stop this...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What is this?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: My favorite food!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Don't give me garbage.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Wow, what great food! It's like heaven in my mouth!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This can't fill up my starving tummy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is the best ever!! This made my day. I love you master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You are too harsh... All this time, and you don't know about my taste yet?

string.name: s1
string.value: Coocoo! Coocoo!

string.name: s2
string.value: No, no, no, no!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am a good bird!

string.name: s4
string.value: I hate bad words!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Aroo~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ah~ Kino needs a rest!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Aroo~ How relexing~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Master, you have a seat~

string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.name: c2_f2

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kino don't wanna rest now.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Kino's bored. Aroo~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want some nice cool drink?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Relex chair is the best!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Aroo~ How relexing~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Want some juice in relex chair?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Kino don't sit just anywhere!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Kino wanna go with master.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Arooooo~ Nooooo~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Kino don't wanna sit now.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wanna rest now with master.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: How nice~ I want some juice too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Let's take a nap.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Arooooo~ Nooooo~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Kino don't wanna sit now.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Aroo... What?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why doing this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't scold me...Arooo...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry. Arooo....

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Aroo! What?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Don't make Kino upset!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Aroo! Kino is upset!

string.name: c7_s1

string.value: Sob sob... I'm sorry.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Arooo... It hurts.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't hit me. Sob sob...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Arooo...Why doing this to cute Kino?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Aroo! What did I do?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Argh! I hate you for being mad at me.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Don't scold me...Arooo...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Don't be mad at Kino...T.T

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Kino is sorry.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrrr~ Don't be mad at Kino.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: What did I do? Aroo!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Don't make Kino upset!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Feels gooooood! Aroo~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Arooo~ Kino is embarrassing.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Aroo! Feels good!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: You can't just poop anywhere.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Kino can use potty.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Kino don't wanna poop now.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just a glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ahoooh~~ Feels good.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yeah~ How nice~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Aroo~ Kino feels good!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Poooooop~ Nice!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Gotta eat something first!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No poop now. Glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Kino can poop only in potty.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just can't do it now. Aroo......

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I was just about to...Aroo!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Please excuse myself....

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Aroo! Feels good!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Oh no, it's too embrassing.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: No poop!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't just poop here!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's not even a potty!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Why don't you go first?

string.value: zz.Zzz.. Aroo...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Nap nap... zzZ

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Kino was so sleepy. Aroo~~

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kino wanna meet you master in dream~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Kino is a sleepyhead...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Kino don't know what you're saying!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Say what?

string.value: Aroo....So sleepy......

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Aroo.. Kino is so sleepy....

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow, nice comfy blanket!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Love comfy blanket! Aroo~~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: How lovely~~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Kino is not sleepy!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Kino wanna sit and rest.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Want some nice cool juice?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Kino will sleep now.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Kino will dream of you master~

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Kino is sleeping now~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Don't wake me up. Aroo...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How nice. Aroo...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Nothing is better than relex chair.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Drinking a juice and sitting on a comfy chair... Aroo~~~

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Kino is not sleepy!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You know what's in my bag? Aroo~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What on earth is that?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Kino wanna relex in relex chair!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Time for adventure!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: No! No!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No! No! NEVER!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What? Kino don't know what that is. Aroo~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo.. Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you're just so wonderful!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Kino is a bit hungry....

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Kino have no idea what you're saying..Aroo~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! Kino don't know!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Kino don't wanna talk now.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kino wants some juice in the relex chair.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Kino is so happy to be with you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Aroo! You want hear something funny? Well, maybe next time~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Kino just love sparkling stone!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: No! No!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood for talking now.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You mean........You want Kino to say something?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kino will just go to sleep now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Aroo... Kino is embarrasing.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kino like you too~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Really? Aroooo~~~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kino too~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Ha ha!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You can't just walk around saying that!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Forget about love........

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: At least you should have prepared nice sparkling stones.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Kino is so happy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Kino feels good today.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Kino actually....tehee...likes you too...

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Love? What is that?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Huh?? You must be kidding.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Yeek! You're not serious, are you?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: No.... You're joking now, right?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kino's heart is pounding too. Arooo....

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Kino sees only you master~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kino is overwhelmed!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's nice to hear that~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Forget about love stuff. Let's just have some juice.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Phew... Kino need to sit for now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Nothing beats the lovely orange juice.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Nevermind~ Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Bleh bleh~~~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Bleh~ Aroooooo~~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: How's that!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? What did you just said?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Don't make Kino upset!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Kino don't want any of that.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Arooo.. No, not today.

string.value: Bleh bleh~~~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Bleh~~ How's that!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kino's bleh is just so adorable!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Actually, kinda tired today.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What is that?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Shouldn't you buy some food first?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Bleh~~ How's that!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Here's Kino's cute bleh attack for you! Ha ha!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Bleh~ Arooo.....

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: No! Arooo......

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No, you just don't do that like that.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: No, not now!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.value: Aroooooo. Tada~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Aroo aroo! Wham!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Arooo. Ready to transform?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Don't be too surprised. Tada!

string.value: Forget about transform stuff...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Kino needs some rest today...

string.value: It's not a free service you know...

string.value: Wow! So delicious! Aroo!

string.value: Eeek! It's awful!

string.value: Aroo! Don't say such a thing!

string.value: That's not a nice thing to say you know!

string.value: No! Don't say such a thing!

string.value: Quack Quack Quack!

string.value: My legs ARE getting tired

string.value: You're the boss...

string.value: Quack! Is this the right place?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Okay, okay, I'm sitting!

string.value: Watch me, it's easy.

string.value: I'm waiting for a challenge.

string.value: Quack quack! You got it Boss!

string.value: It is so dirty here, I can't rest!

string.value: Let me eat first!

string.value: Aren't you the bad one?

string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.value: I'm sorry... Hug me please?

string.value: That was scary. Kiii...

string.value: I'll be better... much better....

string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.value: Don't look at me~

string.value: You expect me to poop in public?

string.value: I just did...

string.value: No Master... No...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Don't want to!

string.value: It's embarassing...

string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.value: Ahhh, that was good...

string.name: c15_f3

string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to poop here...

string.value: Ah that feels good...

string.value: Oh that was fast...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3

string.name: c16_f4

string.value: Me too!

string.value: That's nice of you...

string.value: Feed me first.

string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.value: That was a typo right?

string.value: I'm sure you don't! ARP!

string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.value: Keep loving me!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master

string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Up! I'm standing UP!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.value: I'd rather climb a tree!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we swing!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm hungry.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I want to sleep instead...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I wont live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.value: Play with me! kiiii...

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: What shall we do?

string.value: Are you bored too?

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Good to hear that!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I am hungry

string.value: Play with yourself!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: So annoying!

string.value: Wow really?

string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Let's have some fun!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Go somewhere else!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You rock!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: It's about time!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Food! Food! Food! Food first!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: We just did, didn't we?

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What did you just say?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: Well... I am sleepy now...

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Hmmm... So comfortable!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Yawn... Sleepy sleepy!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: It's PLAYTIME!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Read me a story first?

string.value: Good night Master...

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Yawn... Bedtime!

string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: Cuddle me!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: I just woke up! ARP!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.value: kii! kii!

string.value: Food... Food...

string.value: I am so full!

string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.value: No, no, nope.

string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.value: Yip! Yip! Ooh, comfy!

string.value: Yip! Yip! I sat, so gimme a treat!

string.value: Yip? No! No!

string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.value: Yip! Yip! I like sitting.

string.value: Too easy! Yip yip!

string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.value: Yip... Yip... Yip...

string.value: Yip! Yip!

string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.value: I'll do better. Yip!

string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!
