string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything... Yip.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Grr... Bad master!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll do my best. Yip!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yip! Everyone makes mistakes.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're mean... Yip!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'll be careful.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Yip! I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: My mistake! Yip! Sorry, master!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Yip! Don't be mad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I didn't do it! Yip!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: No? No?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: *Whimper* I don't get it...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: *Whimper* You're bad...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I agree!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You and me both. Yip!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yip? You really think so?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr... You're no fun...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Why so serious, master? Yip!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I think I'm smart... Yip.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Bad, master! Bad!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Yip! Stop lying to me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Yip? Yip yip?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip yip!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I-I think it moved! Yip!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I pooped! I pooped! Yippee!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Your turn, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't. My tummy hurts. *Whimper*

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: *Whimper* Poo is dirty.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Poop. Poop! Hee hee! Poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are for pooping!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wipe my butt, please. Yip!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: *Whimper* Look at it! It's huge!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yip! I don't wanna poop!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: *Whimper* I'll go tomorrow.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You first, master! Yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'm studying humanese!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Am I doing it right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Ah, where'd you go?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: This is hard... Yip!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I practiced hard. Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: How do I look? Yip!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Brr, the floor's cold. Yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is uncomfortable!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Like this? Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Yip yip! This is haaaard!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Yip yip yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! Yip!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm your best pet! Yip!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I'll follow you anywhere! Yip!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Liar! Yip!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Yip! Food?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I love you too! Yip!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'll write this down in my diary! Yip! Can I have a diary?

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Yip! You're nice.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Liar liar! Yip yip!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: You don't mean it. *Whimper*

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Yip! You're embarrassing me!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I love you, master!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: You're just saying that. Yip?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Liar, liar, pants on fire!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: You can't fool me. Yip!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Yip yip! Yip yip yip!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Yip... Yiiip...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Yip! I'm full...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s1
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: s2
string.value: No bad words! Bad master!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Mew! Mew!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Mrrrow! Mew!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Meow!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Okay, let's rest here. Meow!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Mew! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Good idea, master!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Meow... Here?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Am I still okay? Meow!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Let's walk some more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we take a break?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay! Here? Right here?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, the floor's dirty here!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ask me nicely.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Mew!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you want, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hm... Meow!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Meow! Meow!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Meow! I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Meow... I'm scared, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't hit me!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're so weird!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please...cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I-I c-c-can't stop cryyyyiiiing!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't make me mad!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're heartless!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Meow... D-don't get mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You'll regret this, master! Meow!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I-I'll run away!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're so annoying! Mew!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're asking for it! MROW!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Meow! Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Master! Mew!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Come again?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you. Meow?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Meow! ...You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? Meow!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you feeling okay?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...Well, I am lovable.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest cat.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Well... I don't know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Meow! You're weirding me out!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop joking around.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please look the other way.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: How rude!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: D-don't watch me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Mew! Was that too loud...?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, hide me! Meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: D-disgusting. Meow.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't get you...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to...?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Meow! Oh... Feels good!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Really? You're so weird...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: *Yawn* Goodnight.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Goodnight! Meow!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should sleep, too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Bedtime already? Meow?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: So tired! Goodnight, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I love sleeping.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can't sleep here!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You're sleepy, too?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams. Dream about me-ow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Nothing to talk about...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm enjoying the quiet.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: What is your favorite pet?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Keep working hard! Meow!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Watch me! Watch me! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Don't be surprised!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Mrow!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I'll be there right away.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Meow!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! You're too mean!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You're always ordering me around...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever you want, master! Mew!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Watch me, watch me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Meow!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Mrow!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No. You do it!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I want to eat first.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it...if you beg on your hands and needs.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Meow! Yummy!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I've been waiting for this!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Meow... I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Oh, I like this!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s2
string.value: Meow! I hate bad words.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Neigh! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this? Wehee...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I need some rest...proompfh...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'll pass...proompfh...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I like standing just fine.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I was feeling rather tired...neigh...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't wanna...proompfh...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'll pass. Wehee.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna sit! Proompfh.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: The wind feels so good...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Anything for you master...wehee.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scaring me, master...neigh...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I won't do it again...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Master, what's wrong?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Neigh? What?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master, you're being unfair!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Baaaahhhh... I'm so sorry... Sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I still love you master...neigh...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master...your face is wrinkled...it's ugly...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Leave me alone, master! Proompfh!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Er, me too, master!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Yay, master!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Whatever! I'm hungry!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please tell me every day.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is yours, wehee.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah, no thanks. Wehee.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master... That's just weird.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: What did I eat...?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Ahh, much better.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Here? How?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: That's not sanitary. Wehee.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hurrgh... No good.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Wehee... Okay, but don't look!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Not in broad daylight!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Master... That's nasty.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are people watching!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Okay, here I go. Proomph!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Hurrgh...It's not coming...Hurrgh!!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Eh? Pretty unicorns don't poop.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Okay, maybe just a little...zzz....

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: To dreamland I go....zzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good night, master...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Neigh...but it's still bright out...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: But... I'm wide awake!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Brrr... You sleep first.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Good night now...neigh...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm already headed to dreamland...Proompfh...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Neigh... You're lazy, master!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Neigh...I'm tired...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Master, let's just go hunting...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Neigh...I don't want to...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Master, silence is golden!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm an expensive unicorn! Proompfh!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Time for the Unicorn Show!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm still getting ready!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me first! I'm hungry!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Master, don't be too amazed!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ha! I'm not that easy!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I was waiting for that...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: It doesn't look very tasty...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so yummy.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s2
string.value: Master...this is so disappointing. Proompfh...

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Not here!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: But I'm not tired.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Good idea, I was feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Aah! So comfortable!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: W-wha-what? I can't hear you very well.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I really don't want to right now...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Goo...so comfortable. Why don't you come sit with me, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm starting to feel sleepy just sitting here like this.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to sit right now! Why do you always want things your way?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Can't I just lie down? Must I sit?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're right. I was bad.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... It was all my fault.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! You're always mad at me for no reason.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Huh? I can't hear you. What did you say?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Okay, I won't do it ever again!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm so sorry, can you just forgive me this once?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Always getting mad at me for no reason... I'm not even scared anymore.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Eek! Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Fooo? Me too!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I like you too, master!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Ugh, people are looking!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Where'd that come from?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: *Blush* You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love you too, master!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Umm...I understand, but I'm afraid I can't...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with another bunny.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I really, really love you too, master.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, you only love me, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I won't be tricked by your lies anymore.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with a pink bunny. Sorry.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Uh, what? Here?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Hya! Aah! That feels so good.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I can't...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't really need to go right now...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Hgggh...Yeah! I did it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Make sure no one looks, okay?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Well, I just don't need to go right now...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: There's so many people around here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I think something good is going to happen today.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm really scared of snow...I can't hide.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm really tired, master.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There are times when I just don't want to talk.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: White bunnies can hide in the snow. I can hide in...charcoal.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I like having black fur. I'm like a ninja bunny!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I just want to rest. I'm tired.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say! Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A Desert Rabbit came to visit me. I thought he was a dust mop.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The Moon Bunny says people keep bothering him about rice cakes.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Master, why don't we just take a nap today?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't have enough energy to talk.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hayat! Wow, I'm up!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Too tired...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you want me to stand up? I want to sleep.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Goo...I'm up! Hold me, master!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Not too bad for a bunny eh? Maybe I can walk on two legs soon!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Aren't you asking a bit too much of me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I want to rest...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ooh...this is a real delicacy!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full! You eat it!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Foo, foo! This is so good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hmm...what happened to my appetite?

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not nice.

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm really disappointed in you, master. You really shouldn't be that way!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Not here!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: But I'm not tired.
