string.value: I don't have anything to say! Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A Desert Rabbit came to visit me. I thought he was a dust mop.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The Moon Bunny says people keep bothering him about rice cakes.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Master, why don't we just take a nap today?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't have enough energy to talk.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hayat! Wow, I'm up!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Too tired...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you want me to stand up? I want to sleep.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Goo...I'm up! Hold me, master!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Not too bad for a bunny eh? Maybe I can walk on two legs soon!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Aren't you asking a bit too much of me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I want to rest...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ooh...this is a real delicacy!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full! You eat it!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Foo, foo! This is so good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hmm...what happened to my appetite?

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not nice.

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm really disappointed in you, master. You really shouldn't be that way!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: La ti da!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Lala... Resting is nice.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I shall rest now.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am fine right now!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Lala...I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want to!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lala...I feel like singing!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My legs were hurting!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You need some exercise.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: La ti...ugh! It's a caterpillar!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I do not enjoy mud!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: A nice wind is blowing!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Whew...no bugs on the ground.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: ...La ti da?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Okay, okay, forgive me...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I am truly sorry!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: W-what? You called for me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Calm down!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: What's wrong with you?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: These aren't tears...I'm just sweating...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Calm yourself!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I truly apologize!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I am innocent!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You judge me so harshly?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: My tears flow freely...wehee...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Lala...you are so uncivil!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm embarrassed... Hee hee.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm so touched!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Woohoo! So happy!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: La ti da ti daaah!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Are...you sick or something?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are grossing me out!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You are beautiful as well.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Lala, I'm so happy...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I am so happy!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is on fire!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Sorry, I am engaged.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You shouldn't lie.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I refuse!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Calm yourself! I...am a unicorn.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: That feels nice!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What? No way!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I am not that primitive!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now I need some paper...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hrrgh... Aaah! Success!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Such a natural feeling. Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're making me nauseous...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What? No!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Please stand guard!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Okay, here I go! Wehee!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Watch and learn!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Aaah...such a sweet scent!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Okay, maybe just a little...zzz....

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's quite bright out!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you sleep first?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I shall rest now. Zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams, friend.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Lala. La ti da hewee...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Zzz...Hmm...bad posture again...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Training must come before sleeping!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't enjoy talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Please go play elsewhere.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Kek...my throat is killing me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Lala...what did you say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Lala...I am an independent unicorn.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Lala! La ti da! Boom!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Unicorn Prince's Secret Move! Ta-daah!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You go first! Wehee!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Oh! Very tasty!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Oh? This is...? T-thank you!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yeah! Meal time!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hmm...this tastes funny... It's spoiled!

string.name: s2
string.value: I am quite...disappointed in you!

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: s4
string.value: This is quite uncivilized.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Whinney. Come sit with me!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Okay! Whinney!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Hoompfh. Don't wanna!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Ew. It's gross here!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Neigh. Neigh?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm a good unicorn!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Let's sing a song!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master... You're getting fat.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: So comfortable!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aren't I a pretty pony?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Whinney... So sleepy...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: What a nice breeze!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ask me nicely!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Gimme a chair!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Hoompfh... Why?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Do you hate me?!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Bad master!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I hate you!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Whinney...I'm sorry.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Neigh! Waaah!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Hoompfh... What'd I do?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! Sorry sorry sorry!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You wanna fight?!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm getting mad. Neigh!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Big jerk-face!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Waaah! Waaah! WAAAAAAH!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: B-but I love you, master!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm scared... Neigh!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: No, you're bad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Cool off, you jerk!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I wanna go home!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Neigh! Heart Power!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Am I a pretty pony?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Whinney, whinney! Hurray!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I love you too, master!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Do you need a doctor?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Liar! Neigh!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You're scary, master!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oh, I'm embarrassed!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? You mean it?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Aw, shucks!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! *Blush*

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Hooray! I hate you master!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm a unicorn, you weirdo!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the best, master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Keep the compliments coming!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: But... I'm a unicorn...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Really? Give me some sugar!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Maybe just a little.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Neeeeiigh! So...tiring...

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Don't look!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Snort! No!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You first!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Grunt! AAAH! IT WON'T STOP!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hoompfh. Look away!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No! No! No way!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You dummy!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Was that a joke?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You stand watch, okay?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, it's golden!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Neeeeeeeigh! Aaaah!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Whinney... I'm hungry, master.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Are you for real?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: N-no! There are bugs here!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Neigh... Zzz...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You too, master? Zzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Goodnight, master...zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's still sunny out!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Not yet. Let's play!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Just a little bit... Zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Stay right here...master...zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Don't ditch me here!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Not without a blanket!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You first, master! Hee hee!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams, master.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One unicorn...two unicorns...three...zzz...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Whinney... So sleepy...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I miss my family... Whinney...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Let's go hunting, instead!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Whinney! Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Hungry, I say!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Whinney... My brother is purple.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Who's prettier, me or Esel?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd rather listen.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Why? You bored?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Blue's the best color!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Blah. Blah. Blah!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, isn't cake the bestest?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I want sweets! Neigh!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where could my brother be?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Catch me if you can!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Neigh! Are you amazed?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Like my performance?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Don't wanna.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: After you.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'm the bestest. Neigh!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: What do you think, master?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'm a special magic unicorn!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Nope. Not gonna do it.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I'm too tired, master!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Let's just play instead, okay?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: You're the nicest!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Oh, this tastes so good!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't wanna eat anymore...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: You must like me, master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: s2
string.value: This is...too much! Whinney, whinney!

string.name: s3
string.value: Why'd you say that for?

string.name: s4
string.value: How could you?!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Neigh! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this? Wehee...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I need some rest...proompfh...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'll pass...proompfh...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I like standing just fine.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I was feeling rather tired...neigh...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't wanna...proompfh...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ah, no thanks. Wehee.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna sit! Proompfh.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: The wind feels so good...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Anything for you master...wehee.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scaring me, master...neigh...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I won't do it again...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Master, what's wrong?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Neigh? What?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please don't hate me...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master, you're being unfair!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Baaaahhhh... I'm so sorry... Sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I still love you master...neigh...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master...your face is wrinkled...it's ugly...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Leave me alone, master! Proompfh!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Er, me too, master!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Yay, master!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Whatever! I'm hungry!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please tell me every day.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is yours, wehee.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah, no thanks. Wehee.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master... That's just weird.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: What did I eat...?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Ahh, much better.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Here? How?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: That's not sanitary. Wehee.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hurrgh... No good.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Wehee... Okay, but don't look!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Not in broad daylight!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Master... That's nasty.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are people watching!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Okay, here I go. Proomph!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Hurrgh...It's not coming...Hurrgh!!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Eh? Pretty unicorns don't poop.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Okay, maybe just a little...zzz....

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: To dreamland I go....zzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good night, master...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Neigh...but it's still bright out...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: But... I'm wide awake!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Brrr... You sleep first.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Good night now...neigh...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm already headed to dreamland...Proompfh...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams, master.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Neigh... You're lazy, master!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Neigh...I'm tired...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Master, let's just go hunting...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Neigh...I don't want to...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Master, silence is golden!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm an expensive unicorn! Proompfh!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Time for the Unicorn Show!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm still getting ready!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me first! I'm hungry!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Master, don't be too amazed!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ha! I'm not that easy!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I was waiting for that...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: It doesn't look very tasty...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so yummy.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s2
string.value: Master...this is so disappointing. Proompfh...

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: La ti da!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Lala... Resting is nice.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I shall rest now.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am fine right now!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Lala...I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want to!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lala...I feel like singing!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My legs were hurting!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You need some exercise.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: La ti...ugh! It's a caterpillar!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I do not enjoy mud!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: A nice wind is blowing!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Whew...no bugs on the ground.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: ...La ti da?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Okay, okay, forgive me...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: W-what? You called for me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Calm down!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: What's wrong with you?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: These aren't tears...I'm just sweating...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Calm yourself!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I truly apologize!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I am innocent!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You judge me so harshly?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: My tears flow freely...wehee...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Lala...you are so uncivil!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm embarrassed... Hee hee.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm so touched!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Woohoo! So happy!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: La ti da ti daaah!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Are...you sick or something?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are grossing me out!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You are beautiful as well.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Lala, I'm so happy...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I am so happy!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: My heart is on fire!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Sorry, I am engaged.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You shouldn't lie.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I refuse!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Calm yourself! I...am a unicorn.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: That feels nice!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What? No way!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I am not that primitive!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now I need some paper...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hrrgh... Aaah! Success!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Such a natural feeling. Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're making me nauseous...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What? No!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Please stand guard!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Okay, here I go! Wehee!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Watch and learn!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Aaah...such a sweet scent!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Okay, maybe just a little...zzz....

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's quite bright out!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you sleep first?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I shall rest now. Zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams, friend.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Lala. La ti da hewee...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Zzz...Hmm...bad posture again...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Training must come before sleeping!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't enjoy talking.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Please go play elsewhere.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Kek...my throat is killing me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Lala...what did you say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Lala...I am an independent unicorn.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Lala! La ti da! Boom!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Unicorn Prince's Secret Move! Ta-daah!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You go first! Wehee!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Oh! Very tasty!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Oh? This is...? T-thank you!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yeah! Meal time!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hmm...this tastes funny... It's spoiled!

string.name: s2
string.value: I am quite...disappointed in you!

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: s4
string.value: This is quite uncivilized.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Whinney. Come sit with me!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Okay! Whinney!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Hoompfh. Don't wanna!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Ew. It's gross here!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Neigh. Neigh?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm a good unicorn!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Let's sing a song!

string.value: Master... You're getting fat.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: So comfortable!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aren't I a pretty pony?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Whinney... So sleepy...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: What a nice breeze!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ask me nicely!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Gimme a chair!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.value: Hoompfh... Why?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Do you hate me?!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Bad master!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I hate you!

string.value: Whinney...I'm sorry.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Neigh! Waaah!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Hoompfh... What'd I do?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! Sorry sorry sorry!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You wanna fight?!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm getting mad. Neigh!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Big jerk-face!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Waaah! Waaah! WAAAAAAH!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: B-but I love you, master!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm scared... Neigh!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: No, you're bad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Cool off, you jerk!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I wanna go home!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Neigh! Heart Power!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Am I a pretty pony?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Whinney, whinney! Hurray!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I love you too, master!

string.value: Do you need a doctor?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Liar! Neigh!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You're scary, master!

string.value: Oh, I'm embarrassed!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? You mean it?

string.value: Aw, shucks!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! *Blush*

string.value: Hooray! I hate you master!

string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm a unicorn, you weirdo!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the best, master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Keep the compliments coming!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: But... I'm a unicorn...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Really? Give me some sugar!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.value: Maybe just a little.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Neeeeiigh! So...tiring...

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Don't look!

string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Snort! No!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You first!

string.value: Grunt! AAAH! IT WON'T STOP!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hoompfh. Look away!

string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.value: No! No! No way!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You dummy!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Was that a joke?

string.value: You stand watch, okay?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, it's golden!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Neeeeeeeigh! Aaaah!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Whinney... I'm hungry, master.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Are you for real?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: N-no! There are bugs here!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Neigh... Zzz...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You too, master? Zzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Goodnight, master...zzz...

string.value: It's still sunny out!

string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Not yet. Let's play!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Just a little bit... Zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Stay right here...master...zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Don't ditch me here!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Not without a blanket!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You first, master! Hee hee!

string.value: Sweet dreams, master.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One unicorn...two unicorns...three...zzz...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Whinney... So sleepy...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I miss my family... Whinney...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Let's go hunting, instead!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Whinney! Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm hungry. Hungry, I say!

string.value: Whinney... My brother is purple.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Who's prettier, me or Esel?

string.value: I'm sleepy...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd rather listen.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Why? You bored?

string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Blue's the best color!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Blah. Blah. Blah!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.value: Master, isn't cake the bestest?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I want sweets! Neigh!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where could my brother be?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Catch me if you can!

string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.value: Like my performance?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: After you.

string.value: I'm too hungry!

string.value: I'm the bestest. Neigh!

string.value: I'm too tired, master!

string.value: Nothing's better than a relaxing chair.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Drinking juice and sitting on a comfy chair... Aroo~~~

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Kino is not sleepy!

string.value: You know what's in my bag? Aroo~

string.value: What on earth is that?

string.value: Kino wanna relax in a relaxing chair!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Time for adventure!

string.value: No! No!

string.value: No! No! Never!

string.value: What? Kino don't know what that is. Aroo~

string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo... Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you're just so wonderful!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Kino is a bit hungry...

string.value: No! Kino don't know!

string.value: Aroo! You wanna hear something funny? Eh, maybe next time~

string.value: Kino just loves sparkling stones!

string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood to talk now.

string.value: Kino too~

string.value: Forget about love...

string.value: You should've at least prepared some nice, sparkling stones.

string.value: Kino is so happy.

string.value: Kino feels good today.

string.value: Kino actually...tee hee...likes you, too...

string.value: Love? What is that?

string.value: You're the only one for me, master~

string.value: Kino is overwhelmed!

string.value: It's nice to hear that~

string.value: Forget the mushy stuff. Let's just have some juice.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I sat, so gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yip? No! No!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I wanna stand. Yip!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You sit down too, master! Yip!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I like sitting.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yip! I'm good at everything!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Too easy! Yip yip!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You're taking it easy on me 'cause you care. Right, master? Yip!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: *Whimper* I don't wanna!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is hard!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Yip? Watch me!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Yip... Yip... Yip...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Yip! Sorry! Sorry!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Yip. I'm sorry! I'm sorry!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll do better. Yip!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything... Yip.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Grr... Bad master!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll do my best. Yip!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yip! Everyone makes mistakes.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're mean... Yip!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'll be careful.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: *Whimper* Forgive me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Yip! I'm sorry, master!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: My mistake! Yip! Sorry, master!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Yip! Don't be mad!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I didn't do it! Yip!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: No? No?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: *Whimper* I don't get it...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: *Whimper* You're bad...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I agree!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You and me both. Yip!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yip? You really think so?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr... You're no fun...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Why so serious, master? Yip!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I think I'm smart... Yip.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: *Whimper* Bad, master! Bad!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Yip! Stop lying to me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Yip? Yip yip?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip yip!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I-I think it moved! Yip!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I pooped! I pooped! Yippee!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Your turn, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't. My tummy hurts. *Whimper*

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: *Whimper* Poo is dirty.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Poop. Poop! Hee hee! Poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are for pooping!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Wipe my butt, please. Yip!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: *Whimper* Look at it! It's huge!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yip! I don't wanna poop!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: *Whimper* I'll go tomorrow.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You first, master! Yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'm studying humanese!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Am I doing it right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Ah, where'd you go?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: This is hard... Yip!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I practiced hard. Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: How do I look? Yip!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Brr, the floor's cold. Yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is uncomfortable!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Like this? Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Yip yip! This is haaaard!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.value: *Whimper* This is hard...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: *Whimper* I don't get it. How?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Yip yip! Maybe later.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Wow, this is fun! Yip!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm too tiiired... *Whimper*

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.value: Yip yip yip!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! Yip!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I'm your best pet! Yip!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'll follow you anywhere! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Liar! Yip!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Yip! Food?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too! Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'll write this down in my diary! Yip! Can I have a diary?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yip! You're nice.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Liar liar! Yip yip!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You don't mean it. *Whimper*

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Yip! You're embarrassing me!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you, master!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You're just saying that. Yip?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Liar, liar, pants on fire!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: You can't fool me. Yip!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Bad joke! Yip!

string.value: Yip yip! Yip yip yip!

string.value: Yip... Yiiip...

string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Yip! I'm full...

string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s1
string.value: Yip? Yip?

string.name: s2
string.value: No bad words! Bad master!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Mew! Mew!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Mrrrow! Mew!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Meow!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Okay, let's rest here. Meow!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Mew! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Good idea, master!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Meow... Here?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Am I still okay? Meow!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Let's walk some more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we take a break?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay! Here? Right here?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, the floor's dirty here!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ask me nicely.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Mew!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you want, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hm... Meow!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Meow! Meow!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Meow! I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Meow... I'm scared, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't hit me!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're so weird!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please...cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I-I c-c-can't stop cryyyyiiiing!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't make me mad!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're heartless!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Meow... D-don't get mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You'll regret this, master! Meow!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I-I'll run away!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're so annoying! Mew!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're asking for it! MROW!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Meow! Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Master! Mew!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Come again?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you. Meow?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Meow! ...You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? Meow!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you feeling okay?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...Well, I am lovable.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest cat.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Well... I don't know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Meow! You're weirding me out!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop joking around.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please look the other way.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: How rude!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: D-don't watch me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Mew! Was that too loud...?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, hide me! Meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: D-disgusting. Meow.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't get you...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to...?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Meow! Oh... Feels good!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Really? You're so weird...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s1
