string.name: c33_s4
string.value: what fun it is to ride In a one-horse open sleigh!! Master merry christmas!!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Without riding shed on sky....it is not real christmas.

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: I am missing Santa claus

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: I dont like christmas

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: I am lonley...

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Ahung..! Ahuung!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: wow~ Feed!!~ Ahung..~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am full!!Ahung.....

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master~ it is soo delicious~ Ahung..~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I cannot eat anymore....... Ahung.....

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, This is really delicious

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... Do you want me die?

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Mew! Mew!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Mrrrow! Mew!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Meow!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Okay, let's rest here. Meow!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Mew! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Good idea, master!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Meow... Here?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Am I still okay? Meow!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Let's walk some more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we take a break?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay! Here? Right here?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, the floor's dirty here!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ask me nicely.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Mew!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you want, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hm... Meow!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Meow! Meow!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Meow! I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Meow... I'm scared, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't hit me!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're so weird!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please...cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I-I c-c-can't stop cryyyyiiiing!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't make me mad!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're heartless!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Meow... D-don't get mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You'll regret this, master! Meow!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I-I'll run away!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're so annoying! Mew!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're asking for it! MROW!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Meow! Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Master! Mew!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Come again?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you. Meow?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Meow! ...You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? Meow!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you feeling okay?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...Well, I am lovable.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest cat.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Well... I don't know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Meow! You're weirding me out!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop joking around.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please look the other way.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: How rude!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: D-don't watch me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Mew! Was that too loud...?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, hide me! Meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: D-disgusting. Meow.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't get you...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to...?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Meow! Oh... Feels good!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Really? You're so weird...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: *Yawn* Goodnight.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Goodnight! Meow!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should sleep, too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Bedtime already? Meow?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: So tired! Goodnight, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I love sleeping.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can't sleep here!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You're sleepy, too?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams. Dream about me-ow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Nothing to talk about...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm enjoying the quiet.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: What is your favorite pet?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Keep working hard! Meow!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Watch me! Watch me! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Don't be surprised!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Mrow!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I'll be there right away.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Meow!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! You're too mean!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You're always ordering me around...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever you want, master! Mew!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Watch me, watch me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Meow!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Mrow!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No. You do it!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I want to eat first.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it...if you beg on your hands and needs.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Meow! Yummy!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I've been waiting for this!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Meow... I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Oh, I like this!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s2
string.value: Meow! I hate bad words.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Well, what do you know!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Awesome. I don't even need a chair!

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: This is nice...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: This spot isn't that bad...

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: No way!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Are you serious?

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I don't think so.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Nah, I'm good.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: This is the perfect spot!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Nice, nice.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How did you know I needed some rest?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was dead tired. Thanks!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Nah. You get no respect.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Not a Husky, dude. Try again.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I'll stand, thanks.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lotus position ok?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Resting in peace feels good.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Lotus position ok?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Resting in peace feels good.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: My bad.

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Ok, that's my fault.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I'll fix it!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Nope. This is your fault.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You make me laugh, master.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: So, how will you fix this?

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I thought I taught you better...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I'm sorry!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You got me there. I apologize.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: My bad, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: My fault!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Back to the drawing board!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: There's no way to pin this on me!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I can't believe you!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: No, you suck!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Man...I feel bad.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: My sincerest apologies, master.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: But all the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Did you say something? I didn't think so.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: How about you sit down for a change?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Are you talking to me? ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Too bad, so sad.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Finish yapping and let's get out of here.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Man...I feel bad.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: My sincerest apologies, master.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: But all the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Did you say something? I didn't think so.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How about you sit down for a change?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you talking to me? ARE YOU TALKING TO ME?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Too bad, so sad.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Finish yapping and let's get out of here.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I win.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Too easy.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: It's time...

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: I'm positive I've played this before...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Are you sure you want to play this game?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You're not ready.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I don't know that song.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Give me a challenge, if you can think of one.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yes, you. Watch your step.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'd be more careful if I were you...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: The person behind you is next.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: That guy? No problem.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: A tad out of touch, I see.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: To think I woke up this morning for this...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Think it over. Hard.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Take out "play" and you have a deal.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Let me show you how to "kill-steal" someone...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I see what you did there.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Time...is on my side.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Wait for it...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'll let you think about that for a moment.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Don't feel like "playing."

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Let me show you how to "kill-steal" someone...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I see what you did there.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Time...is on my side.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Wait for it...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'll let you think about that for a moment.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Don't feel like "playing."

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: It happens.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I can honestly say mine doesn't stink. Much.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Ah~ I needed that.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It came out smooth!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Uh, you first!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: No, thanks. I'm good.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: All stuffed up and no place to go...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: That was a fantastic dump.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Time to drop the kids off!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: So nice.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Behold the power of bran muffins.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's been a long time since I've had to do that.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: And they say the dead don't have dignity...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you looking at me?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I guess there are some things even the dead have to do.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oops, I almost stepped on it!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: It's ALIVE~~ ALIVE!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Okay, THAT felt good.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: If I did, you might go blind.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey, look at that...it's...just gas. Sorry.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: And they say I'M the crazy one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Not in public!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I guess there are some things even the dead have to do.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Oops, I almost stepped on it!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: It's ALIVE~~ ALIVE!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Okay, THAT felt good.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: If I did, you might go blind.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, look at that...it's...just gas. Sorry.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: And they say I'M the crazy one.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Not in public!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: What would you ask of me?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: No lips, but I talk anyway. AMAZING!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You should pay a visit to the Haunted House!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can tell that you like...no, never mind.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't feel like talking to you~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why would I want to talk to you?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't you have a quest to do or something?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I've had more intelligent conversations with snails.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: So, this guy walks into a potion shop...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'd really like a Prendergast toy~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: For some reason, I feel right at home in the Vanished Village.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I don't just talk, I chatter!

string.value: Bored to death!

string.value: Sit? Alright I'll sit...kyu~~

string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.value: It's dirty here...kyu...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.value: I have nothing to say...KYU...

string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My eternal tummy is full!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Rawr! Such earthly delights!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Sit? Sit!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you say so...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Rawk! Rawk rawk!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: And if I say no?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let's sit in silence, mm-hmm?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How dull.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: No... Don't... Bad...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't you think you're overreacting?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawk... Rawk rawk rawk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Rawk... What did I do?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I simply don't understand.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What is it NOW?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hmph, you must be bored.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Enough. I've had enough!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Think this over. Don't you value our friendship? RAWK!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Love you! Rawk!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: That's more like it!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Love, love. Such a sweet word!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You like me? You really like me?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Is your love true? Oh, who cares!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'd blush, but parrots can't blush...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Sorry, but my heart belongs to a little parakeet in Henesys.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How awkward.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But what will the other parrots think?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: RAWK! LIAR!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: The love between parrot and master is forever!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Is it the color of my feathers that did it? Or the manly shape of my beak?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sh, keep your voice down! You're embarrassing me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Caaan you feeel the love tooooday...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Prove it!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No! I won't let you break this parrot heart!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Sure, you say that now, but isn't this just a flight of fancy?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hee hee! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My melancholy heart, once dark like Kerning City's nighttime sky, is brightened by your affection! CRAAAAW!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yes! Very good! Let's have fun! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you. Not that I feel the same way, but it's nice to hear.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You find me attractive? Is that what you're telling me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you feel a special kinship for me? Or is it something more?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love? I simply can't understand it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Love? Bah! Who needs it?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Rawk! How degrading!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Good idea to lighten the load. Makes it easier to fly. Rawk!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Rawk! You need a sample? I didn't know you were a doctor!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed. I feel like I can fly! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Sorry. Stomach's not feeling up to the task today!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What a thing to say! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What a disgusting thing to say!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't do...THAT on command!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Rawk! I'll just make a little room for lunch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Rawk! I was going to do that, anyway!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Very well. Fire main cannon!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You can tell I've been eating the good stuff because it doesn't smell. Ha!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Feed me first. Rawk!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to do such base things! RAWK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'm not a faucet, you know. It doesn't happen on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Think before you speak! Think!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That's a child's word. I prefer the word feces, myself.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Observe, as my body excretes the waste it's built up through the digestive process!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I've got stage fright. Mind singing a song to help me relax?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: R-rawk! Wait for it...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: RAWK! That didn't feel right out. Maybe I should see a doctor...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How did you know I had to go? That's a little unsettling...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't you look after your business, and I'll look after my own? Rawk!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I seem to be having trouble. Do you have some yogurt I could eat? Rawk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams! Rawk!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: This is nice sleeping weather. Rawk!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I may not have eyelids, but I can sleep with the best of them!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Remember, even when I sleep, I'm watching you! Zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not sleepy, not one bit!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What will you do while I sleep? Rawk!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You won't put ME to sleep!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Perhaps I'll wake up early and get the worm... Rawk!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm going to eat well and sleep right. Goodnight!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Goodnight, and may you dream of many eagles.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Rawk! I can't sleep right after eating!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No. I get headaches if I sleep too much.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'll not sleep my life away! RAWK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I please, thank you very much!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sometimes I get so busy counting sheep I forget to actually sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nothing like a good nap when you're feeling sleepy!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll dream of pigs and slimes tonight. I just know it.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My friends say I talk to much. Makes it hard to sleep. That's not true, is it? RAWK!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: That's okay. I slept yesterday.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me to shut up, aren't you? Rawk!

string.name: c19
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey is dumb as a brick. I wouldn't want to be on his bad side, though!

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Quick! Get me a navigator and a helmsman, and we'll set sail for Florina Beach!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Secrets? No such thing. If you can tell one person, you can tell everybody!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: They say it's not good to talk too much, but I've never found this to be the case! Rawk!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Here's a question! Why is it always night in Magatia and day in Ariant?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Who're the strongest people in Maple World? First Cygnus, then Aran. Third would be the ruler of the Elves, but she's long gone...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Is the Black Mage real? No one's seen him, have they? It all sounds made up to me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: According to this, a pirate is someone who...attacks ships at sea and steals from others. Huh, go figure...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hello! Hello! Kraw want a cracker!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Rawk! Rawk!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Want to see something cool?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show. Rawk!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Welcome to the Parrot Show.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dun, dun, DUN!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Not until I've warmed up!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't perform tricks. Do I look like a mere pet to you? RAWK!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather have a deep conversation?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Sorry, I only perform tricks for people I respect.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It may be the same trick as last time, but it's always exciting!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Finally! I was getting sick of talking!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: For you, I can do this all day!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll keep going 'til all my feathers fall off! Rawk!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'm all tricked out.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Want to see it again? Really?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Forget it, all right? Just forget it!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm all out of feathers here.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Food! Food! Food!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Do I look like a pig to you? Knock it off with the food!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I was hungry enough to eat a shark! Thanks!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Keep this up and I'll be too heavy to fly! Rawk!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I could eat cherries for every meal. Rawk!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm stuffed! I don't think I could even eat another cherry.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All this chattering has given me an appetite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Rawk! You're not fattening me up, are you?

string.name: s1
string.value: I may talk a lot, but even I wouldn't say that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Let's keep it civil, shall we?

string.name: s3
string.value: I know I didn't hear that right. Did I?

string.name: s4
string.value: I see what kind of person you are.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Sitting now!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Already sitting!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Right away!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: On it!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, sir!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I refuse.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: What? Whaaaat?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: By your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yes, immediately!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No can do, sir.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: How humiliating...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I apologize.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't sit anymore.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Oops, sorry.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I repent!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: See my tears!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Excuse me.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Please stop.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes, I apologize.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I repent.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I disagree!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: What did I do?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Oh boy!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Me too.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: No answer.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I love you too.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm blushing.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're making me happy...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ah, I'm so happy. What to do?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You're making me uncomfortable.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: That's unexpected...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I...don't feel the same way.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Pooping, sir.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah... Hurr.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Easy does it.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: That's better.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Stomach's empty.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: So full...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I have a strong stomach.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Finally succeeded.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I feel lighter somehow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I haven't pooped in days...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I cannot obey.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Not in public!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Enough of this...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Nap time!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Overnight shift...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yes, a nap would be good.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will sleep now.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yes, I was about to drop off...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I could use a good rest.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Not sleepy.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I have things to do.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have insomnia.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No, I won't.

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Commencing speech!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I am talking!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I! Am! Talking!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Huh? What?

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: How's this for chatting?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm talking!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Chatting now!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Make no sound...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't say a word...

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I am...an otter.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Actions speak louder than words.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You must listen before you can talk.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can't think and talk at the same time.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Silence is golden.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You talk too much.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I plead the Fifth...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Cuteness begins...now!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I am...cute.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Not feeling it.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'll test the inner tube.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is what I do for fun.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Do I look...cool?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can perform if I have to.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No thanks.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have nothing to show you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know any tricks.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I can't do it.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm fasting...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Grub time!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Still fasting...

string.name: s1
string.value: Dirty mouth!

string.name: s3
string.value: Not allowed!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Bonk! BONK!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Bonk... Woo!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Bonk... Hoo!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Bonk, bonk! Bonkey!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Bonkey feel good!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Mwa ha ha!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Heh... Heh... Heh...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Bonkey sit.

string.name: c3_s2

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Sit? Sit!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you say so...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Rawk! Rawk rawk!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: And if I say no?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let's sit in silence, mm-hmm?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How dull.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: No... Don't... Bad...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't you think you're overreacting?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawk... Rawk rawk rawk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Rawk... What did I do?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I simply don't understand.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What is it NOW?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hmph, you must be bored.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Enough. I've had enough!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Think this over. Don't you value our friendship? RAWK!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Love you! Rawk!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: That's more like it!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Rawk...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Love, love. Such a sweet word!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You like me? You really like me?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Is your love true? Oh, who cares!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'd blush, but parrots can't blush...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Sorry, but my heart belongs to a little parakeet in Henesys.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How awkward.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But what will the other parrots think?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: RAWK! LIAR!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: The love between parrot and master is forever!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Is it the color of my feathers that did it? Or the manly shape of my beak?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sh, keep your voice down! You're embarrassing me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Caaan you feeel the love tooooday...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Prove it!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No! I won't let you break this parrot heart!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Sure, you say that now, but isn't this just a flight of fancy?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hee hee! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My melancholy heart, once dark like Kerning City's nighttime sky, is brightened by your affection! CRAAAAW!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yes! Very good! Let's have fun! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you. Not that I feel the same way, but it's nice to hear.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You find me attractive? Is that what you're telling me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you feel a special kinship for me? Or is it something more?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love? I simply can't understand it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Love? Bah! Who needs it?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Rawk! How degrading!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Good idea to lighten the load. Makes it easier to fly. Rawk!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Rawk! You need a sample? I didn't know you were a doctor!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed. I feel like I can fly! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Sorry. Stomach's not feeling up to the task today!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What a thing to say! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What a disgusting thing to say!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I can't do...THAT on command!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Rawk! I'll just make a little room for lunch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Rawk! I was going to do that, anyway!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Very well. Fire main cannon!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You can tell I've been eating the good stuff because it doesn't smell. Ha!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Feed me first. Rawk!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to do such base things! RAWK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'm not a faucet, you know. It doesn't happen on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Think before you speak! Think!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That's a child's word. I prefer the word feces, myself.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Observe, as my body excretes the waste it's built up through the digestive process!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I've got stage fright. Mind singing a song to help me relax?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: R-rawk! Wait for it...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: RAWK! That didn't feel right out. Maybe I should see a doctor...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How did you know I had to go? That's a little unsettling...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't you look after your business, and I'll look after my own? Rawk!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I seem to be having trouble. Do you have some yogurt I could eat? Rawk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams! Rawk!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: This is nice sleeping weather. Rawk!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I may not have eyelids, but I can sleep with the best of them!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Remember, even when I sleep, I'm watching you! Zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not sleepy, not one bit!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What will you do while I sleep? Rawk!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You won't put ME to sleep!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Perhaps I'll wake up early and get the worm... Rawk!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm going to eat well and sleep right. Goodnight!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Goodnight, and may you dream of many eagles.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Rawk! I can't sleep right after eating!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No. I get headaches if I sleep too much.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'll not sleep my life away! RAWK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I please, thank you very much!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sometimes I get so busy counting sheep I forget to actually sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nothing like a good nap when you're feeling sleepy!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll dream of pigs and slimes tonight. I just know it.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My friends say I talk to much. Makes it hard to sleep. That's not true, is it? RAWK!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: That's okay. I slept yesterday.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me to shut up, aren't you? Rawk!

string.name: c19
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey is dumb as a brick. I wouldn't want to be on his bad side, though!

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Quick! Get me a navigator and a helmsman, and we'll set sail for Florina Beach!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Secrets? No such thing. If you can tell one person, you can tell everybody!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: They say it's not good to talk too much, but I've never found this to be the case! Rawk!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Here's a question! Why is it always night in Magatia and day in Ariant?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Who're the strongest people in Maple World? First Cygnus, then Aran. Third would be the ruler of the Elves, but she's long gone...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Is the Black Mage real? No one's seen him, have they? It all sounds made up to me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: According to this, a pirate is someone who...attacks ships at sea and steals from others. Huh, go figure...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hello! Hello! Kraw want a cracker!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Rawk! Rawk!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Want to see something cool?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show. Rawk!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Welcome to the Parrot Show.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dun, dun, DUN!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Not until I've warmed up!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't perform tricks. Do I look like a mere pet to you? RAWK!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather have a deep conversation?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Sorry, I only perform tricks for people I respect.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It may be the same trick as last time, but it's always exciting!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Finally! I was getting sick of talking!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: For you, I can do this all day!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll keep going 'til all my feathers fall off! Rawk!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'm all tricked out.

string.name: c23_f2
