string.name: c1_s1
string.value: So it shall be.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: As you wish.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I am bound to oblige.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I am already floating.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: My cloud is perfectly comfortable.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You have such strange requests.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Is this what mortals enjoy?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is oddly enjoyable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Wish denied.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You are wasting my powers!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Enough of your trivialities!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: That was not your desire?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Your mortal ways confound me.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You are a cruel master!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You dare assault me?!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why, you ill-tempered little goblin!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Fine, I am sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are not entirely repulsive.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Um, I...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You find my presence...enjoyable?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I-I guess I...like you?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Hmm. Yes.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Um, right.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Master, this is highly inappropriate.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You are my favorite mortal.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You are a fibber! Grawr!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Very well.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Do not disturb me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You summoned me for this?!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: As you wish, mortal.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: The weather IS quite nice...gryaaawn.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I am wide awake.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Finally, a celestial nap!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Come closer and I will...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Mortal lives fascinate me.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say.

string.name: c18
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You talk.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Here I am, talking.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Stand back, puny mortals!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Watch in awe!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Steel yourselves!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Your mind will be blown!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Give me a moment, mortal!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I am no mere pet!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Graaaaawwwwrrr!!! It's show time!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We JUST did that.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: My powers must recharge.

string.name: c21
string.value: This meat is so lustrous!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My eternal tummy is full!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Rawr! Such earthly delights!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Bark bark!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Kong! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh...this is easier! kongkong!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying! Kong!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand!Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Alright! At your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Bark...bark bark...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Woof woof woof!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: So scary...bark

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't hit me...heeng...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry...bark...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I...I'm so sorry...woof...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...woooof...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you mad? Woooof...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, you scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master...things happen sometimes...why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Woof...? Woof woof woof...?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better...bark...much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside...pretty bad...bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you...say such...thing...bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt...woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master...you didn't...really mean it...right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That again? Heheh...

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Woof? Woof woof??

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Woof! Woof woof woof!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Shhhhhh!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I peed just before...bark...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shhhhh! Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew...almost peed on myself...woof...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Whoa, I aimed it wrong...woof...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sorry...don't feel like peeing yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...peeing is reserved for bathrooms...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shhh....arrrrrgh, I stepped on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I won't do it...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Can YOU pee on purpose?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Nah... soo itchy... woof

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who's your favorite celebrity?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well...right? Right?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, master

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! Imma wander around!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I ain't doing that...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Whoa! I'm tall! Woof!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: That's too hard!! Woof woof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No...! WOOF!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it...woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hehe...master, am I doing well?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Woot! Whoa, that's pretty high..

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Wo...woof woof!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Me too! bark bark!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop! I'm blushing! bark bark

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks...bark!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Hehe...me too...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? Bark bark?

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first...bark...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too! woof woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I feel good...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Eh?? Woof...?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Master...I'm blushing...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe! I feel goooooood!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.value: Bark! bark bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I peed just before...bark...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shhhhh! Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew...almost peed on myself...woof...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Whoa, I aimed it wrong...woof...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sorry...don't feel like peeing yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...peeing is reserved for bathrooms...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shhh....arrrrrgh, I stepped on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I won't do it...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Can YOU pee on purpose?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Nah... soo itchy... woof

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who's your favorite celebrity?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well...right? Right?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, master

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! Imma wander around!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I ain't doing that...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Whoa! I'm tall! Woof!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: That's too hard!! Woof woof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No...! WOOF!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it...woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hehe...master, am I doing well?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Woot! Whoa, that's pretty high..

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Wo...woof woof!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Me too! bark bark!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop! I'm blushing! bark bark

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks...bark!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Hehe...me too...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? Bark bark?

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first...bark...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too! woof woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I feel good...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Eh?? Woof...?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Master...I'm blushing...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe! I feel goooooood!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Bark! bark bark bark!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!! FOOD!!! Woof woof...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.value: Master...I'm FULLLLL!

string.value: Mr'aku, I do.

string.value: No want!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grauk! Human no Mr'kuma.

string.value: Maybe you are Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Mr'aku! Skuna unar!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Un! Un! Unina!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Heheheh, me skuna!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Try again, I bite you!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You not scary.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Mr'putama human...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Invidia.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I start big jealousy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am beautiful voluptuous woman-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Mors.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I watch over death.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am great and wise man-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of death like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21
string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you encountered death, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid death, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Only the guilty have to fear death. Are you guilty?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can stand in the face of death, we can be partners in destruction.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3

string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.value: What? WEK?

string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: YOU talk, and I listen.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel good.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: WEK WEK so warm~!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hug me hug me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: You smell, WEK.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I feel like hurling... WEK.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Too hot here! WEK!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Okay, come here. WEK!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hug meeeee WEK!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't come near me! WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: My goodness, you smell. WEK.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Hug me tiiiight.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now that felt good.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Can we do something else?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You don't even love me.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Not you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Hah... wEK.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: My eyes are heavy... WEK.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I feel sooo tired... WEK.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I just woke up, WEK!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Zzzzz... Zzzzz.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, WEK!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Is that for real? WEK!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: And I believe you, WEK!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? No, WEK.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.value: My cloud is perfectly comfortable.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Is this what mortals enjoy?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is oddly enjoyable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.value: Wish denied.

string.value: You are wasting my powers!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.value: Enough of your trivialities!

string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.value: That was not your desire?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Your mortal ways confound me.

string.value: You are a cruel master!

string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You dare assault me?!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why, you ill-tempered little goblin!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Fine, I am sorry.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.value: You are not entirely repulsive.

string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.value: Um, I...

string.value: You find my presence...enjoyable?

string.value: Hmm. Yes.

string.value: Um, right.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2

string.value: You are my favorite mortal.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I know.

string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.value: You are a fibber! Grawr!

string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Feed me first!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: That's SO juvenile!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't need bathroom lessons!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Such language!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but don't watch me!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Arooo! My face is all red now!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I don't think I'll ever stop!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Phew! That was tough!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Everything's blocked up down there!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll poop when I wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You're going to get us in trouble!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Mmmm... Zzzz...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: My prince... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Why? The sun's still out!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm independent! I take naps on my own time!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Let's play a little more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to sleep already? You're lazy!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Let's play again afterwards!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ah, my soft and cozy tail.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to dream up a storm!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't go anywhere, got it?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you, I'm having fun right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy the day! Aroo!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Yeeyap! You do it!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yeeyap! Okie dokie!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Arooo... I miss the prince and rose... zzz

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping in the desert is SO romantic!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't order me around! Yeeyap!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why aren't we out hunting? That's way more fun!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Arooo! You sure are lazy.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Aroo! I want to go to the desert of freedom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to travel with a wonderful prince!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love Star Candy so much!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Isn't my star muffler awesome!?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What are we talking about? I'm a fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Arooo! Did you want to hear something?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: A fox has to keep some secrets!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yeeyap! I'm not feeling chatty!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Wanna go watch the shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The star that the prince and I went to was much better.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Aren't you curious about the meteor I was on?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Eating star candy can make you feel better!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't want to talk!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We foxes are known for our quietness.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Yeeyap! Yeeyap!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm hungry! Let's eat instead!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I can't believe they have more like me at a ZOO!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: There are so many people on this star!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm the only talking fox!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I get my fur trimmed on a daily basis.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should learn to entertain yourself!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I've chilled enough today!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not sharing my secrets...

string.name: c22
string.value: Nod nod

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Nod nod

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm one dancing Fennec Fox!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You should play some music first!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I want to be in a concert!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: My throat hurts!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aroo! I wanna do something else!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: YOU do some dancing!

string.name: c23
string.value: Nod nod

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Up and down my head goes!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: The prince taught me how to do that!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That dance is super popular on asteroid B-612!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You wanna do it too?

string.value: Yeeyap! My foxes are barking!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We've got all day tomorrow too!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Let's do something fun instead!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Nodding is hard.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Yum! This is too tasty!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: You should stop eating!

string.value: It's good to be a fox of the desert!

string.value: I'm stuffed...

string.value: I was JUST thinking about these!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Wait! I'm too full!

string.name: s1
string.value: Huh, no way!

string.name: s2
string.value: Do not want! Let's see it again!
