string.value: That word is SO not romantic!

string.name: s4
string.value: You say bad things! Earth really is a gloomy place!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Squerch.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Good? Squerch.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'll sit here. Squerch.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? I'll try. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What? Squerch.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Not paying attention. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't understand. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's too nasty here. Squerch.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Did I do well?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting is easy!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want food.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: You talk funny.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: As you command!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's easy being a pet...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way I'm sitting

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I won't do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy Can't hear you

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You scare me. Squerch...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Scary face! Hide! Squerch!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be good Squerch...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I let you down... Squerch...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Stop saying that! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: So... sorry...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'm scared...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Here we go

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I just can't win!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll be careful now, master.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ah... master, your words hurt!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master, please forgive me...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Oh... that was good. Squerch...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Smelly! Squerch.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! Squerch.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It...it's stuck... Squerch...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I pooped before! Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That's going to stain

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Eehhh... Eeyaaaah!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Oh my... it smells

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't make me!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I feel much better.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: While everyone is watching me?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master! You poop instead!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I love you too! Squerch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hehe... I'm blushing. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks! Squerch.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Me too. Squerch.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Liar Squerch.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What did you say? Squerch.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Since when? Squerch?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Aww Me too, master!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I think you're really awesome!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I love food.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Right back atcha master!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Liar liar pants on fire.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master's talking gibberish again...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Like this? Squerch.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You like my smile? Squerch.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Hehehe! Squerch.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't I look good? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't have time. Squerch...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you think, master?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Haha, like this?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You first.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Oh alright How about that?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Aren't I beautiful?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hehehe, smile with me master!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I have a killer smile!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not in the mood.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: No smiling for me, thanks.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Please don't say that... Squerch.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Whyyy? Squerch!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: That was harsh. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Look who's talkin'. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm getting mad now! Squerch!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aaaand now I'm pissed. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Take it back! Squerch!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master I can't believe you said that

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke right? Right?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You... didn't mean that

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: You would know!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Take that back!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hurts every time

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Say something nice now. Please?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm all you've got.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, really hungry. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you Squerch

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm not a radio. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I need rest.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Food first, talking second.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I hope you level-up today!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Have you been working out?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Talking's for the fishes.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I thought we just talked

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Cute, right? Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You obviously don't mean it.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Check out my power! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Too much cute squerch...

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Not this time. Squerch.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: You know you love me!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: My eyes are closing squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: You sleep! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Feed me! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: ...you... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Master, I just slept!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Squerch! Squerch! Squerch!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Ka squerch?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No mas... Squerch.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: (Pretends to be indifferent.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: (It sits down quietly.)

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, baa!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Speak louder, baa!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: (You've been ignored...)

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Baa, I'm tired...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Flying is tiring too, Baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My fluff aches, baa!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No, baa baa.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Baa baa, let's rest together.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Baa! Let's rest a bit.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: What are you saying, baa?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Baa baa!!!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, baa!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Don't make me too angry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You are so UN-caring. Baa.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Baa!! *Cries*

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Baa! (Looks happy.)

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Baa baa?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Baa! You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Baa? What did you say?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: ... (You've been ignored.)

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Baa baa baa!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Baa! I love it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What a happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meehee! I like you too!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Baa! Say it louder.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Hahh! Baahhh!!!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: First things first!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Why are you so rude?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Baa! Baa Baa Baa...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hahh! That felt nice...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Baa... Now's the time!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: *Grunt* Whew...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You talk nonsense, Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Hmph! Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Baa Baa, don't push it...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* Baa...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Baa baa... it's coming out!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: (Already asleep.)

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Baa... *smacks lips*

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, baa baa...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: (It's out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: *Snores* Baa...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Baa baa... I'm tired...

string.value: What's that noise?

string.value: The sun's still up!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't joke around, okay?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: (It passed right out.)

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good night... baa baa...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I just woke up...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Baa baa, how annoying!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want some Cloud Candy!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: (It pretends not to hear you.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to talk!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sounds annoying, Baa Baa.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Meehee! You likey, baa baa?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Puffram-only special... booty dance!!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.value: Baa... maybe next time...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How embarrassing, baa baa.

string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.value: Ookyu... I'm scared...

string.value: Byoo! (Bawling)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.value: I hate you!

string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.value: I'll listen from now on...

string.value: Pyoo pyoo!

string.value: Pyoo pyoo! I like it!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.value: Ooh, that surprised me.

string.value: What's going on, ookyu?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Are you messing with me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I like it!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ookyu! You surprised me!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Are you serious?!

string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What a happy day it is today!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ookyu? Are you still single?

string.value: I'm a healthy pet!

string.value: Whoa! I barely know you!!

string.value: Ookyu? Are you serious?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This isn't right!!

string.value: Oo... kyu!! Whew...

string.value: Pyoo!! That felt nice...

string.value: Ookyu! Now's the time!!

string.value: Pyoo! That was refreshing!

string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.value: That's illegal here!!

string.value: Master, cover me well, okay?

string.value: Ookyu! So refreshing!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This REALLY isn't right!!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.value: *Snore* pyoo...

string.value: Gotta rest up for tomorrow!

string.name: c18_f4

string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.value: Pyoo? Did you call me?

string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.value: Ookyu... so annoying...

string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.value: Ookyu... just leave me alone...

string.value: I want to rest, pyoo!

string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: s3
string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: WEK WEK~~ !

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sit? Like this? WEK WEK.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I can do it! WEK!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't do it!! WEK!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: ... WEEEKKKKK ...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Too easy ~~ WEK WEK!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Fun!! WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'll do that later... WEK...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This is good...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Don't bother me

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hooo... hooo... what?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: WEK~! I'll be good.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: WEK WEK~ don't scold me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: WEK~~ I'm so sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: WEK WEK... sniff sniff

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Arrrghh... WEK

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sad... WEK WEK.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Whatever. WEK

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I feel hurt... WEK

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Please forgive me...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You scare me...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Um, WHAT? WHAT??

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Who's talking junk here?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: WEK WEK~~ !

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I almost constipated... WEK

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: That feels good. WEK WEK.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ahhhhhh... that's it. WEK

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Hmph... WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I just pooped. WEK.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: That's quite a relief. WEK

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Ou... WEK WEK

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm constipating these days. WEK.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Here? NO. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Dang, this smells pretty bad.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, don't step on this.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: WEK!!! WEK!!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: WEK~ WEK~~~!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Brilliant~ WEK!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, this is fun. WEK!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: No way. WEK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Don't bother me, WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Standing's my forte, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: At your command, WEK!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm sleepy, WEK.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: NO! WEK!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Hah. Eaaaaasy.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I need some sleep.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: (Totally ignoring the master)

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Talk to someone else, WEK.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You must be lonley, WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No comment, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What? WEK?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: YOU talk, and I listen.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel good.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: WEK WEK so warm~!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hug me hug me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: You smell, WEK.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I feel like hurling... WEK.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Too hot here! WEK!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Okay, come here. WEK!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hug meeeee WEK!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't come near me! WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: My goodness, you smell. WEK.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Hug me tiiiight.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now that felt good.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Can we do something else?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You don't even love me.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Not you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Hah... wEK.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: My eyes are heavy... WEK.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I feel sooo tired... WEK.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I just woke up, WEK!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Zzzzz... Zzzzz.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: WEK WEK ~~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, WEK!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Is that for real? WEK!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: And I believe you, WEK!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? No, WEK.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Um, you're funny. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Me, me me me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I'll always love you, master.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: No way. Really? Really? Awww...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: What a full-fledged lie.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Here, WEK!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I'm good, right? WEK WEK!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, WEK!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm too tired... WEK.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: What? WEK.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this, right? WEK.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Haha, this is fun. WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: What are you saying, WEK.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Here's my hand, err, wing.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Nah, maybe next time.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Ahhh, here's a smooch.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm blushing...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Go brush your teeth first.

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: I like smooches, too.

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I've been dreaming of these~!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kiss me again!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Not me...no way.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Yoo hoo! I'm flyinnnng!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Look! I can fly!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: What are you saying...?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Isn't this cool??

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: Don't I look MAGNIFICENT?

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Yo, I'm afraid of height.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You fly first!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: I can't trust you, WEK.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Of course, master!

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Um, how about a NO.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Let me just sleep, okay?

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: FOOD!!! WEK!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Now this tastes good... WEK~~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: FISH! Woo hoo!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: s2
string.value: Wek... Wek...

string.name: s3
string.value: Master, Please.... Wek...Wek...

string.name: s4
string.value: Master~ Behave yourself~ Wek...

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Quack Quack Quack!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My legs ARE getting tired

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're the boss...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Quack! Is this the right place?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Okay, okay, I'm sitting!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Quack! Who do you think you are?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me fat and lazy?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why don't you sit? Quack!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No way, White Ducks get dirty too easily!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Quack! I love to relax!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Watch me, it's easy.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm waiting for a challenge.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Quack quack! You got it Boss!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Now is not a good time...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Just because you're lazy doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Is it because I'm ugly?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Quack! Don't be angry!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Quaaaack I'm sorry!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: So sorry boss!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't take your anger out on me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Quack quack! Dummy!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Stupid, quack.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Quack! I feel really bad.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: You really scare me...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Quack! I'm trying really hard!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Don't make that face!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Quack, that's a bad look for you.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: You get what you deserve!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there, quack quack!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Wow boss, I really didn't mean it!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Quack, I'm really scared right now!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: That was mean.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Whoa, you look scary...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You should try anger management.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You can't boss me around!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'm innocent!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You must be REALLY bored...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sure thing!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Quack! No Problem!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Man I'm good.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I wanted to stretch my legs anyway!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Quack quack, I don't think so.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm pretty happy sitting.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: So annoying...quack quack!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: QUACK! I don't feel like it.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're lucky to have such a smart duck.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Such a simple request!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Whatever you want boss!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hey, I'm much taller now! Quack Quack.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Quack! Sounds boring.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm too tired!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Not now boss.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just stay here!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: You won't find a Rudolph that can stand like I do

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Man, so annoying

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I'd rather sleep for now.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to do the same thing?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: I can't hear you. I can't hear you

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So embarassing, quack!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Quack! It's smelly!!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I'm too shy!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Quack! It's rude to poop in public!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I poop when I want to.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That was incredible!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's the last time I eat at the pet park!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Quack!Thanks boss, I needed that!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It's just not coming out!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I don't really need to.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'd poop if you fed me.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Quack Quack I don't tell you when to poop!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Careful, you might step in it!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: That's a big smell for a small duck!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Why don't you poop?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'd rather have some lunch.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I have a lot on my mind right now, sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: My poop is none of your business!!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'm behind you 100%!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't forget to feed me!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I like getting closer to you.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I love hearing I LOVE YOU!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: No. I spit when I talk.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: You don't understand me.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Get some friends!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'd like some adventure please!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It's fun being a travelling duck!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Quack! How about this weather?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'd like to hear a joke!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Just being near you makes me bored.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't talk to someone uglier than I am.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I think I have a sore throat!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Quack! I'm a duck, not a professional film and television actor!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Have you thought about getting a haircut?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Somebody needs to go on a diet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Let's go do something fun!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone to talk to?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You must be pretty unpopular...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Maybe another time.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It's not me, it's you.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I love hugs! Quack quack!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Yay! Hug me!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Nothing like a duck hug! Quack quack!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Somebody smells...and it's not me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Quack! You stink!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's too hot in here!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't hug ugly people.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Big hugs for my favorite boss!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Let's hug it out!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I feel so close to you! Quack!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Quack! You're so cuddly!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Do I look like I want to hug you? QUACK!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Go jump in a lake! Seriously...you smell.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Boss, don't you have any perfume?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I have a headache.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yay! I want a hug!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Quack Quack! Duck hugs are the best!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'd take a duck hug over a bear hug any day!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I thought you'd never ask!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't hug people I don't like.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Maybe if you were level 200.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Quack! I love you too!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Quack! You're not so bad yourself!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Thanks! Quack quack.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do we need to have a talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be joking.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Well I don't love you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: QUACK! Love someone else!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're great, boss!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm a lucky duck!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Quack quack, I love you too!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Quack! I love feeling loved!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I only love those who shower.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I don't like liars.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Well I love...food.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Right back at you!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I love hearing that!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You're so good to me!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't really care.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You need to decide if you love me or hate me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't believe you!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: It's my feathery charm.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Yup, I'm adorable!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: How can you resist this face? Quack!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I got it from my mom!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm having a horrible hair day.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm not a performing monkey!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Quack! Get away.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Maybe if you feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'm getting a big head!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Say it again! You know you love me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I do it for you boss!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Quack! I'm so cute it should be illegal!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quack! You can't make me be cute.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: It's a blessing and a curse.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I just want to be left alone.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Quack quack, why don't you be cute?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Is this what you want?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: It's one of my best qualities!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Anything you want boss! You got it!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Man, I'm a handsome duck!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm don't do stupid tricks for stupid people.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Being cute doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: That is SO last year.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're not the boss of me! Well...technically you are.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking swan in the country!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I should be a model.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Beauty is on the outside!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm just an ugly duckling.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Being beautiful doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Why are you so demanding?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Make me.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Quack! I'm tired! You know me so well.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: No. You're not my mom.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep right now!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Quack!! I'm not tired!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: No! I'd rather eat.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Boss, I'm exhausted!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know best!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Sigh...I guess I can do that.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Is this what you mean?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Are you tired or something?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No, not right now.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get rid of me?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Yay! I love a good nap!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Okay, but can we get some lunch when I wake up?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I'd enjoy catching some Z's! Zzzz...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Leave me alone!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: No. You're not my mom.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I want to go swimming!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep if I'm not tired!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I could dance all night!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Oh yea! Shake your tailfeather!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: How many times will you ask me to dance?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: It's time to party!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Leave me alone!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Don't be jealous of me! Let's see you dance!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I only dance with people I love.

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm too tired. Feed me.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: To be or not to be...dinner...that is the question.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: The simplest solution is always the best!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Never assume malice when stupidity will explain everything.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I think, therefore I am...a duck?

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You should try reading a book.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: No, not right now.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Why are you so demanding?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Leave me alone!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I want to go swimming!

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Do it yourself! Quack!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: quack quack! Quaaaaaaaaaaack!!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Oh yum! Quack!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: No...I'm too full!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Boss, you make amazing food!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No thanks! If I eat another bite I'll explode.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Quack! This is delicious!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't have room for anymore food.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Kwa! Grauk u'nar!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Human, yes.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Mr'aku, I do.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No want!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grauk! Human no Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Maybe you are Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Mr'aku! Skuna unar!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Un! Un! Unina!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Heheheh, me skuna!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Try again, I bite you!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You not scary.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Mr'putama human...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: What I do wrong?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Drakla, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm not done digesting yet!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Mmm...chak'to unar...zzz

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kwa! Heheheh!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Nyah nyah! Grauk drakla!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.value: My name Metus.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I make many fears.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am speed-demon boy!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.value: talk|chat|say

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True demon power!

string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4

string.value: Rak, you demand much.

string.value: No! You sit, stupid human!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.value: Un! Un! Unina!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Heheheh, me skuna!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You mad one? I like!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You not scary.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Mr'putama human...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.value: Rak'a unar...

string.value: What I do wrong?

string.value: Kr'ishmor! Leave me alone!

string.value: I no understand.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You know better...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Blech! Human words so nasty.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I...love...you...too...HAHAHAHAH! I lie good!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: ...What you want from me?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.
