string.name: f3_f
string.value: I already fat!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Keep it coming!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s1
string.value: Ha! Unia, Mr'aku.

string.name: s2
string.value: You...like demon joke?

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: (Pretends to be indifferent.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: (It sits down quietly.)

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, baa!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Speak louder, baa!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: (You've been ignored...)

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Baa, I'm tired...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Flying is tiring too, Baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My fluff aches, baa!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No, baa baa.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Baa baa, let's rest together.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Baa! Let's rest a bit.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: What are you saying, baa?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Baa baa!!!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry, baa!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Don't make me too angry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You are so UN-caring. Baa.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Baa!! *Cries*

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Baa! (Looks happy.)

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Baa baa?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Baa! You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Baa? What did you say?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: ... (You've been ignored.)

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Baa baa baa!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Baa! I love it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What a happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meehee! I like you too!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Baa! Say it louder.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Hahh! Baahhh!!!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: First things first!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Why are you so rude?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Baa! Baa Baa Baa...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hahh! That felt nice...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Baa... Now's the time!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: *Grunt* Whew...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You talk nonsense, Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Hmph! Baa Baa.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Baa Baa, don't push it...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* Baa...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Baa baa... it's coming out!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: (Already asleep.)

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Baa... *smacks lips*

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, baa baa...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: (It's out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: *Snores* Baa...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Baa baa... I'm tired...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What's that noise?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: The sun's still up!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Don't joke around, okay?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: (It passed right out.)

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good night... baa baa...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I just woke up...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Baa baa, how annoying!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want some Cloud Candy!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: (It pretends not to hear you.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to talk!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Baa baa!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sounds annoying, Baa Baa.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Meehee! You likey, baa baa?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Puffram-only special... booty dance!!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Baa... maybe next time...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How embarrassing, baa baa.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Baa baa...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Looks delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I ate a lot today...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm full...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Thank you for the food!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm full now, baa baa.

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s3
string.value: Be nice, baa baa!

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Eoung eoung!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, why not?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't wanna sit.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you calling me fat?!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah, this is the life!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Um. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: But I'm not tired yet.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sure. Sit with me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't be so lazy.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you tired already?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Forgive me?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: But... But... But... Awww.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Whatever. I know my rights.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Oh, cut it out.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: But I wuv you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm hungry, that's all.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: But, you're my only friend.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Just stop talking to me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't be a hypocrite.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Be respectful!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Wanna FIGHT?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'll behave, I promise!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: But I love you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You don't own me!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Of course you do.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What's not to love?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Aw, thank you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Shucks, I'm blushing.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Who ARE you?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Eh, do I know you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: How nice for you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're smarter than you look.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Keep the love flowin', baby.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: It's because I'm adorable, right?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't buy it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're not so bad yourself.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You and everyone else.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oh, just shove it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: YAWN. Don't care.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: One, two, three: UNNNGHF!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If you say so.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I beg your pardon?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um. No.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: YOU poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh, this DOES feel nice.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're such a drill sergeant.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Um, that'd be weird.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It actually smells quite nice.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Next time, let's go together!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: It's like soft-serve ice cream!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: No, thanks. I'll hold it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you feeling all right?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Maybe later.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Night, night.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Will you tuck me in?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Awww, is the human sleepy-weepy?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Will you cuddle with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Think you can make me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleep is for the weak.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo! Just, shoo!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I need some "me" time, please.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to chat.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You talk too much.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dancing makes me hungry!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'M NOT A MONKEY!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Bounce, wiggle, bounce, wiggle, bounce!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Feel free to join me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Not right now, please.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I looooove ramen!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Sooooo stuffed. Mmmm.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.value: What are you feeding me?!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s2
string.value: That isn't funny!

string.name: s3
string.value: Just my luck. You're TERRIBLE.

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Bark bark~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Bark~ BARK BARK!

string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Like this? bark bark!

string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Alright~ At your command!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of your commands...

string.value: Heeeng... heeeng...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm so sorry... bark...

string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.value: I... I'm so sorry... woof...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... woooof...

string.value: Master, are you mad? Woooof...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.value: Stupid... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That again? Heheh...

string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.value: No peeking~ Bark bark~

string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Hoggy! You can't go in such a humble place~!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: What do you want? Touchy~

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Tell me to poop after feeding me something! I'm starving. Touchy~!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm already going! Get ready to clean up Touchy!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Now that I'm fed such delicious things, I can let out a lot~! Thanks~ Touchy~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My stomach was hurting~! Thanks a lot! Touchy~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Good Good~ Refreshing! I will call you, Master once since I'm in a good mood~!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Touchy! What did you just ask me to do? Could you not make me get more and more touchy?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry I couldn't push anything out, even if I wanted to! How could you do this to me?! Touchy~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ I only go when I want to go! That's my way~! Hoggy!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Touchy! If I go right now, it won't be much! I will wait and poop later!

string.name: c16
string.value: Tell me|Say it|Please tell

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Touchy~ Touchy!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm a hedgehog~ Hoggy!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Don't make me!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Words! Words! Words!

string.name: c17
string.value: Tell me|Say it|Please tell

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm not saying this because I like you Touchy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Needles are quite prickly~ But you always hug me. I'm so grateful! Hoggy~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Touchy~ Always cheer up Touchy! You can be strong Touchy! Like me~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Touchy you are so great for understanding hedgehog language. Touchy~Touchy~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Touchy~ I don't want to talk right now! I don't feel so good!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you making me more touchy~! Touchy~!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ Don't tell me what to do~ Hoggy~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Touchy~ I will talk! But I won't give you my heart!

string.name: c18
string.value: Tell me|Say it|Please tell

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: We spent such a long time together... now shall I call you, Master? Touchy~!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ I wish I could travel with Master all my life~ Hoggy~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Touchy! Thank you for loving me and taking care of me all the time~ Touchy!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I have critical skills! Rolling Attack! With needles up and body rolled up~!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Touchy~ you know me! Why do you make me do these things in the first place~!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Hoggy~ Now stop~! Stop the talking as well~! Stop eating? No!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Touchy you speak hedgehog first~! Touchy~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm sorry! I can't say it!

string.name: c19
string.value: I love you|Adore you|My love

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Tou~ Chy~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Ho~ Ggy~

string.name: c20
string.value: I love you|Adore you|My love

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I appreciate how you feel Touchy. Touchy~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I don't like Touchy~ Really~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I don't want to listen to such things! I really don't~ Hoggy!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Touchy~! You and I feel the same Touchy~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Touchy~ Don't ask for my love! Touchy~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Hoggy~ Prove it. Hoggy!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm sorry but we're not in that kind of relationship! Hoggy~!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Touchy~ I'm not giving you any reaction because I'm Touchy~! Touchy!

string.name: c21
string.value: I love you|Adore you|My love

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy! My heart will also be for you Touchy~ Hoggy!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Touchy~ The reason why I'm so touchy is that~ It's because I like you Touchy~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: No~ Can't have second thought! But, why do I keep falling for Touchy?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Touchy Now I will be less touchy to you~! Touchy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Love? That's for Junior Reaper! Touchy!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hoggy~ I know you say sweet things but at the same time your eyes are after another pet!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Hoggy! Then come hug me tightly! Hoggy~!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Okay~ Okay~ I will take your word for it~ Touchy~Touchy~

string.name: c22
string.value: I love you|Adore you|My love

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I've always thought Touchy was a great master. Touchy~!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Let's spend more time than we've spent together already~ Hoggy~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~ Master How about it? You like?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: From now on I will be a little, just a little less touchy~ Touchy~ Touchy~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Touchy~ Touchy~ I'm quite touchy right now! Be careful Touchy~! Touchy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Touchy you're all good except that you say I love you too easily~! Touchy~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't have the strength right now! I will tell you later! I'm too tired! Hoggy!

string.value: Let's go to sleep|Sleepy|Zzz|Good night

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm going to sleep~ Touchy~

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Sleepy~ Hoggy~ So sleepy~ Hoggy~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Touchy! I can't sleep when Touchy is being so loud! Touchy!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: How can I sleep when I'm not sleepy? Hoggy~

string.name: c24
string.value: Let's go to sleep|Sleepy|Zzz|Good night

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Touchy! I'm sorry I fell asleep ahead of you.... Talked so much...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ Now that we've spent such a long time together you know my bedtime~!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Touchy~ I've been so touchy all my energy is gone. Ah~ I think I'm passing out~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Hoggy~ Now you're tucking me in~ Impressive~ Hoggy~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Touchy! No! I don't want to sleep! Don't force me~!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Touchy~ If Touchy isn't sleeping with me I won't either~! Touchy~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ It's hard for me to sleep when my needles are prickling me too! Hoggy~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Touchy! First feed me. I can't sleep because I'm too hungry! Touchy~

string.name: c25
string.value: Let's go to sleep|Sleepy|Zzz|Good night

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm not sleeping because I'm sleepy... I'm really not falling asleep because I'm sleepy....

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We have to be together longer, but I'm too sleepy right now! I'm sorry~ Master~!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Hoggy~ One good deed before I go to bed~ I will call you, Master~ Hoggy!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Touchy~ I hope Master has a happy Maple trip even when I'm asleep~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Touchy~ if you keep ordering me to do stuff, I will be bad! No~ I will get more touchy!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Hoggy! Do you want me to fall asleep? Well, yeah, I guess you would!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ I'm not at all tired right now! So how can you ask me to go to sleep?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Touchy~ Why don't you go to bed first Touchy? I will do the hunting!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Touchy~ Touchy~ Thank you~!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Hoggy~ I'm so full right now! Hoggy!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I'm not eating because I want to Really

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Making me eat the same stuff over and over again will make me get sick of it Touchy!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Now I like the affection behind the food you are giving me~ Hoggy~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Touchy~ I'm on a diet right now! I'm going to lose weight! You hear me? Touchy~

string.value: Touchy! Hoggy!

string.name: s2
string.value: Touchy! You shouldn't say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: You know I'm touchy, right, Touchy? So don't say those things! I will get touchy!

string.name: s4
string.value: I will only call Touchy Master when you talk nice

string.value: Great~! Kyong!

string.value: Kyong! (Laughing him off...)

string.value: I'll think about it Kyong Kyong

string.value: Kyong Kyong~I wish this was the rose garden

string.name: c3_f4

string.name: c4_f3

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Kyong Kyong~ I can do that on my own!

string.value: I'm sitting nicely~ Tell me I did well~

string.value: I sat~

string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.value: Master, sit with me~

string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.value: Let's sit together~ come here

string.value: What's the point? There's not much difference in sitting and standing up...

string.value: I don't like today's orders!

string.value: The floor seems dirty~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name is Moss.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can handle silence.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am a wise and elderly member of my magic clan.

string.name: c20_s4

string.name: c20_f2

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Ah, come on~!

string.value: Tell me|Say it|Please tell

string.value: Have you ever faced silence?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Do you wish to avoid silence by getting close to me?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: If you had faith, you wouldn't fear silence...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you are not afraid of silence, you belong to a magic clan.

string.value: I will distance you from everyone with jealousy!

string.value: I will acknowledge you if you can make me get jealous!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Mew! Mew!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Mrrrow! Mew!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Meow!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Okay, let's rest here. Meow!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Mew! So comfortable!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Good idea, master!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Meow. Here?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Am I still okay? Meow!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Let's walk some more.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Shall we take a break?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay! Here? Right here?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, the floor's dirty here!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow. I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ask me nicely.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Mew!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice. Mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you want, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Enough. Stop it.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Hm... Meow!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Meow! Meow!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Meow! I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Meow... I'm scared, master.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't hit me!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're so weird!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I-I c-c-can't stop cryyyyiiiing!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't make me mad!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You're heartless!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Meow... D-don't get mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You'll regret this, master! Meow!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I-I'll run away!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You're so annoying! Mew!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You're asking for it! MROW!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Meow! Me too!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Master! Mew!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're the best!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Come again?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't hear you. Meow?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Meow! You're embarrassing me.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Really? Meow!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you feeling okay?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Well, I am lovable.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the luckiest cat.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Meow! You're weirding me out!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Stop joking around.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Don't look!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Ah, yuck.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Right here? Really?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: How rude!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: D-don't watch me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Mew! Was that too loud...?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah, hide me! Meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: D-disgusting. Meow.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't understand.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to do what?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Meow! Oh, feels good!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Keep a look out. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr. Okay! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Really? You're so weird...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow. What am I suppose to do here?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: *Yawn* Goodnight.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Goodnight! Meow!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should sleep, too.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Bedtime already? Meow?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Are you sleepy, master? I'm not sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: So tired! Goodnight, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I love sleeping.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can't sleep here!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1

string.value: Wake me up when it's chow time!
