string.value: I'm too hungry to sleep.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm a tough pup! I don't need sleep!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe you need a nap! Yip!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Yip yip! No! I think I smell an intruder!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yip... yip... zzzz.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Blue Birdy... two Blue Birdy...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Gotta chase my tail! Gotta chase my tail!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What? Wait! There might be snakes around here!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll turn into a piggy puppy, yup!!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Give me a salmon treat and I'll think about it!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Aww... why are my legs so short?!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I'm studying humanese!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Yip yip! I can't understand human language, yip!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Yip yip! Yay!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Yip yip!! I want some bacon!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I really don't like this...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Yip yip!! You are the best, master!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Give me all the foods!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: That was the best! Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s2
string.value: Master, you can't do that.

string.name: s3
string.value: Yip yip! How could you say that?

string.name: s4
string.value: Be careful master!! Everyone's watching!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Peng? Peng?

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Peng! Peeng!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: So I sit like this? Peng?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Peeng? I sat like you told me to!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sitting sure is comfortable, peng!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Peng? How do I sit?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: ?? I don't speak human yet!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Show me how to do it! Peeng!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I have to sit on this bare ground? Peng?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You sit down too, master! You look tired! Peng!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: It's a good thing my butt is so fluffy! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Peng, thank you master! I was actually kinda tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ah, it feels like I came to a picnic! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm gonna look like a cushion if I sit... peng peng...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: My legs aren't even hurting... do I really have to sit? Peng?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit unless it's on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: My legs are too short... Peng...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Now that I sat down, I feel sleepy... peng...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you tell me to!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I was actually feeling a bit tired! Peng!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Peng peng! You sit down and rest too!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting makes my belly look fat.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing! Peng!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Once I sit, it will be hard to get up, peng...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Peng? What did you say?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Peeeng... Peng...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Peng! Pe-pe-pe-pe-peng!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Peng? Peng peng!!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hearing that from you hurts my feelings. Peng.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Peeng... I didn't do it on purpose...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! Peng peng!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't think it will make you angry. Peeng...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Peeng? I don't get what I did wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Peeng! But I told you that I didn't mean to!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you just taking your anger out on me? Peng peng!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're scolding me for eating too much, aren't you? Peng peng!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again... peng peng...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I just did that to get your attention!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Peeng... I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Peeng! Sorry! Don't hate me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Peng peng! I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Peeng! You started it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's hard to understand your words! Peng peng!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Peng! You're a real jerk sometimes!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: A-are you gonna throw me away? Peng...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Peeng. Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I bet you're saying that for my own good.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I deserved that. Peng.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I learned it from watching you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Peeng! I hate it when you get mad for no reason.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Peeng! Sometimes I just want to fly away!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna tell Chloe!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Peng pe-pe-pe-peng!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Peng peng! Anything for you!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Peng! A smooch for you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Peng! When I met you, it was love at first sight!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Peng... you're embarassing me!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you say, master?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That was a really bad joke, peng peng.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that, master... peeng...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I know what you feel, but that's just... peng...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I was waiting for those words! Peng peng!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: A smooch on your cheek! *Mwah*

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll give you a smooch anytime! Peng peng peng!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Peng... this is a little weird, but I like it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you serious? Peng peng?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: We are in public!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You caught me off guard...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Peng? What did you just say?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You really like smoochies!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I love giving smooches!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Give me a smooch too, master!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Love you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I thought I heard something weird...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, are you that lonely?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's like the violent winds of El nath...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm more into other penguins...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Peng peng peng peng!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Peeng! Excuse me for a second then!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Peeeng! I'll be careful then!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Penguins only poop a little!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Peeng! There's my poo!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Peng... I'm embarrassed.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Peeng... we are in public!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Peeng peeng... I didn't even eat that much...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Peeng... I don't feel like pooping.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Peeng! Can you block for me?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Peeng... so embarrassing...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Peeng! I feel weird!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Peeng! So refreshing!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Take me to a restroom! Peeng?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Peeng peeng... do I really have to?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I think I need a laxative... Peeng...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Peng... pooping is so embarrassing!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Gently like a Penguin! Peeng!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't forget to clean up after I'm done! Peeng!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Cover me up!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Whew, that was smelly.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: That's so embarrassing! I can't... I can't! Peng!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Everyone's looking, master! Peng peng!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I think that's against the law...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm too cute to poop! No way! Peng peng!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Peng peng peng peng peng!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Peng? Really? You really think so?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Peng peng peng! I'm embarrassed!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Thank you for the compliment! Peng peng!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Gotta make a cute face...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're trying to butter me up!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I like it better when you're honest...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I've heard that a million times!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Peng? Did you say something?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have an awesome owner! Peng peng!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I know, everybody tells me that.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You're embarrassing me master! Peng!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You know how to make a penguin happy! Peng!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I think you're lying. Peng...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Can't you say something more original? Peeng?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: So embarrassing! Peng peng!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Peng... what did you say?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You sure know how to look at a penguin! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I feel like I'm falling for you all over again! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I'm not as awesome as you, though!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel like I can fly when you say that! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I want to hear 'cool' more than 'pretty'! Peng!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Sounds like you're just trying to flatter me. Peng?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Peng? I didn't hear you. Can you say that again?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Are you sure I don't look fat?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Peng peng! Peng peng peng!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: ...Peng peng peng peng.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Peng peng? Peng peng peng.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Peng... I can feel your love!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: That's embarrassing! Peeng!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You really mean it... Peeng!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: (*Thump thump*)

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Don't say tricky things to me! Peng peng...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you aren't my type. Peng peng.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ...Peng? What did you say?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Peng... love? Human language is difficult!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I love you too! Peeng!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My love for you grows and grows!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: What do I do? My heart won't stop beating! Peeng!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Peng peng! I just want to brag about this to everyone!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What is love?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Why are you trying to flatter me like that?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Peng peng? Are you trying to eat me?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Peeng... I only like other penguins. Maybe a parrot...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Do you see my love overflowing?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Peeng! I feel like singing a song!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Peeng! My heart feels warm!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Love sure is a wonderful word. Peeng!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Penguins and humans can never be!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You should bring me a nice fish if you mean it.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: That's great, where's dinner?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I thought you were seeing someone already!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Peeng? What should I say?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Peng peng! Human language is hard!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You may not think we get cold, but El Nath is super frosty!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I'm feeling a little chubby. Need more fish!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: So what do you want me to say? Peeng?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: When was the last time you saw a talking penguin?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Nah, it's too much work!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Are you wondering if real penguins make the peng noise?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I want some mackerel ice cream. Peng!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: The Pepes in El Nath are my mean cousins!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I can't fly, but I'm still a bird!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Human language is too hard!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I want to hear you talk first. Peng...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: ... I really don't have much to say. Peng?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Peeng... is there something you want to hear?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Pepes and yetis are friends, but penguins hate yetis! Peeng.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Chloe is really good at knitting! You didn't know that, did you?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Someone even asked me whether I really have legs. Peeng...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Peng peng... Sometimes I want to fly in the sky.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Talking to your pets makes you look like a crazy person!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't really have anything to talk about...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I'm a penguin!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: There are too many people here.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Hug me! Peng peng!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I love hugs, peng peng!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I totally feel the love!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hugs make me warm! Peng peng!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Peng. Whoa, calm down, buddy.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Uh, how about a flippershake?

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I thought you wanted my hand?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: ...Peng? Are you serious?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Hugs and snugs! Peng!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Hug me tight, master! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love being hugged by you, master!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: I can't reach you, master! Pick me up! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Don't whine, master. Peeng.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Eh, give me a flipper instead!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: There are too many people watching!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I love my hug-loving master! Peng!

string.name: c30_s
string.value: Hugs make my heart warm!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me master!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Everybody's gonna be sooo jealous!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You are not a child!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Should I shake your hand instead? Peng.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: We need to talk about personal boundaries...

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I don't want to do that in public!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Good night, master! Peng!

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: I'm already asleep now... Zzzz...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I'm sleepy... Peeng...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Sleep on the ground? Where's the ice?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I can't sleep when I'm not sleepy. Peng!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Penguins sleep on full bellies. Peng peng!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Good thinking! Pengzzzz

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Good night! Peeng! Sweet dreams...

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I hope I see a Pepe in my dreams... Peeng...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: There's not even a bed! Why do you hate me?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: You're going to run away as soon as I close my eyes!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: What, do you think I'm lazy?

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: You sleep well too. Peng peng!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to sleep on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I love napping when you're around... Peeng...

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fatter... then I won't be as cute!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: What about my food?!

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when you sleep.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Aww, it's not working!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: I'll be able to fly one day, right?

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: One day, penguins will fly like eagles!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You have to teach me how to fly first... Peeng...

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: What will you give me if I fly? Peng?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Peeng? Have you ever seen a penguin fly?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll show you that penguins can fly too! Peeng!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I flew! I flew! Sort of...

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: I'll fly us away to the moon one day!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Oh, no, my belly's too heavy.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You really think it's possible to fly with these wings? Peng?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: Peng peng? I can't fly away and leave you here all alone!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Peng! Peng peng!!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Peng... peeeng...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you for the food! Peng peng!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore... Peng...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Peeng! Maybe I'll get taller if I keep eating!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: My stomach is going to pop... peng...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Wow! It must be delicious! Thank you! Peng!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Peeng... Do you have a grudge against me?

string.name: s2
string.value: What are you saying? Peeng?

string.name: s3
string.value: Aren't you supposed to talk nicely? Peeng?

string.name: s4
string.value: Peeng? I'll get upset if you keep saying weird things!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Havin' a sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little break.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nothin' like relaxin' on a bomb.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This be right nice.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Go on, cap'n. I'll watch this bomb.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I say to ye, no!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why do ye ask such things?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I've places to be, cap'n!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I agree, it be time for a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: This bomb be special, ye know.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ye should rest as well. I worry about ye.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yarr, me legs were gettin' tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Brave pirates never rest, cap'n!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't make me peck at ye.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: That not be a very inspirin' order.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: What was that, cap'n?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I do be rather tired...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Now all I be needin' is some blueberries.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I not be sleepin'. Just restin' me eyes.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Not a bad idea, cap'n.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I not be carin' for ye orders.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ye not be understandin' who yer messin' with...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to ye?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: My mistake.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Aye, I deserved that.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I be hearin' ye, cap'n.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Apologies, cap'n.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yarr, I messed up.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Did ye finally crack, cap'n?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What be ye problem?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This be a real dissapointment.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Belay that, cap'n!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Let's forget about this, cap'n.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Don't make me walk the plank!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'll not dissapoint ye again.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Oh, cap'n...I be so sorry.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Bah! Why should I care?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Ye need to be more carin' than that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Must've heard ye wrong, cap'n.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Bah. I be wantin' some grub.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I be reflectin' upon me mistakes.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ye have me apologies.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Sorry. I'll be a much better pirate.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Don't leave me, cap'n!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Keep this up, and ye'll have a mutiny on ye hands!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You treat ye crew like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Shape up, cap'n!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Yarr, cut that mess out!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Ye be my best mate, capn'n.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: If we be stuck together, I be okay with that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Always good to have the cap'n's ear!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Affection accepted, cap'n.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: That's behavior unbecoming a pirate, cap'n!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Life at sea be lonely, cap'n. Deal with it.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I feel a bit sick, cap'n. And I not be seasick.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Stop givin' me the crazy eye, cap'n!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ahoy there! Ye be makin' me feathers all ruffled.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That's a good one, cap'n. Never gets old.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's good, cap'n. We are shipmates, after all.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm so glad our piratey ways brought us t'gether!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yarr, I be tryin' ta eat here!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Not sure how I feel about bein' yer crew, cap'n.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeah you do. No surprise there.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You gone soft on me, cap'n?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ye be the only cap'n for me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I be swashin' any buckles you want!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be ye first mate anytime, cap'n.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This be the happiest moment in me piratey life.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, my ladybird awaits me at our next port of call.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: That's inappropriate conduct for a cap'n, cap'n.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I love TREASURE, cap'n. And you should, too.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ye compliment is bilgewater to me.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Aye aye!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ahh, sweet relief.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Now THAT is a real pirate's poop.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Yar har ho hee hoo!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What filth be this?!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Even pirates have standards, ye scallywag!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This not be the poop deck, cap'n.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Yarr, I be a few pounds lighter now!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Looks like no scurvy today!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yarr, I be givin' it all I've got!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'm not swabbin' up after this, cap'n.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ah, cap'n first.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll not mess me pantaloons!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Ye be one strange pirate, cap'n...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: This be hurtin' me confidence in ye.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I be droppin' another load!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It be an unhealthy obsession, but I be needin' ta go...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'll not cross swords 'till I've had a good poop!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I've made me own buried treasure!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Ye dissapoint me, cap'n.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Stow that, cap'n!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ye be havin' the sea crazies, cap'n?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Leave me be!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: G'night, cap'n.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I be dreamin' of plunder tonight.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I be sleepin' well with a bomb under me pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ye takin' first watch, cap'n? Goodnight, then.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's work to be done!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun be shinin'! I can't sleep now!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: There's plenty more fight in me, cap'n!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I be takin' first watch.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Aye, just need a good bomb to sleep on.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ye shouldn't disturb a sleepin' pirate...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Can't... keep... me eyes... open...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You keep watch, cap'n...I'll get some shut-eye.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I've plenty of fire in me! I don't need sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm not following that order! I'll mutiny!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Must've heard ye wrong, cap'n.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's piratin' to be done!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little sleep after that.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Gonna catch a few winks before our next voyage.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Time for bed. Hope the bomb don't blow.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Aye, I'll be dreamin' of booty!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Ye don't have ta give orders all the time, cap'n!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why sleep when there's pillaging to be done?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't make me turn on ye!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Ye should repect me! I be a scary pirate!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm gonna be king of the pirates!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: One day, I'll own me own ship...the Black Pebble.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Want to see me treasure map? Ha! Too bad!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I once lived with a navy admiral, ye know.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Eh? What did ye say?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No time to talk, cap'n!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Let's hear ye story first, cap'n.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't trust ye enough to share me secrets...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I broke free from a navy admiral's cage.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The sea be the only place for me.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I be in love with blueberries, ye know.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have ye planned dinner? I be wantin' fruits!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Pester another crewman, cap'n!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: If ye be bored, round us up some treasure!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Speak up, cap'n!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Not very dignified, cap'n.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'll be a great captain meself one day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: This hat be the finest silk, ye know.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: We spend too much time on land, cap'n!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I always wanted to be a pirate.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Ye be to needy, cap'n.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Less talk, more blueberries!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Nay, it be me alone time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'll abandon ship if ye keep this up!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yarr, I be TRANSFORMIN'!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See these? These be skin-color tights!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: For me next trick, I'll break out of me cage!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This be only for ye, cap'n!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That be foolishness.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What nonsense be this?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Stow that mess, cap'n.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I be too hungry for ye tricks.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'd like to see ye do this!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This trick be unique!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No photos, please!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ye be annoying. Stop it.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I be gettin' sick of ye pesterin'.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I be on vacation today.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Oh, no. Ye go first, cap'n.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Ho ho!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This grub be delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Aye, I be so full!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Me cap'n be the best!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Me belly be full ta burstin'!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It be too delicious, I say!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'll get scurvy from that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Know ye manners, cap'n.

string.name: s3
string.value: Ye be abusin' the chain of command.

string.name: s4
string.value: Do ye need to go back ta cap'n school?

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Eoung eoung!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, why not?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't wanna sit.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you calling me fat?!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah, this is the life!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Um. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: But I'm not tired yet.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sure. Sit with me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't be so lazy.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you tired already?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Forgive me?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: But... But... But... Awww.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Whatever. I know my rights.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Oh, cut it out.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: But I wuv you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm hungry, that's all.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: But, you're my only friend.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Just stop talking to me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't be a hypocrite.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Be respectful!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Wanna FIGHT?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'll behave, I promise!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: But I love you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You don't own me!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Of course you do.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What's not to love?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Aw, thank you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Shucks, I'm blushing.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Who ARE you?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Eh, do I know you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: How nice for you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're smarter than you look.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Keep the love flowin', baby.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: It's because I'm adorable, right?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Prove it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't buy it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're not so bad yourself.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You and everyone else.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oh, just shove it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: YAWN. Don't care.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: One, two, three: UNNNGHF!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: You got it!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If you say so.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I beg your pardon?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um. No.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: YOU poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh, this DOES feel nice.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're such a drill sergeant.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Um, that'd be weird.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It actually smells quite nice.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Next time, let's go together!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: It's like soft-serve ice cream!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: No, thanks. I'll hold it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you feeling all right?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Maybe later.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Night, night.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Will you tuck me in?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Awww, is the human sleepy-weepy?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Will you cuddle with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Think you can make me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleep is for the weak.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo! Just, shoo!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I need some "me" time, please.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to chat.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You talk too much.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Dancing makes me hungry!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'M NOT A MONKEY!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Bounce, wiggle, bounce, wiggle, bounce!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Feel free to join me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Not right now, please.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I looooove ramen!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Sooooo stuffed. Mmmm.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you feeding me?!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s2
string.value: That isn't funny!

string.name: s3
string.value: Just my luck. You're TERRIBLE.

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Fine. Happy, now?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I suppose this is tolerable.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Whatever, fine.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: But why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Stop annoying me.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You gonna make me?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I suppose this is acceptable.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't hear you . Speak up.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: This is just a coincidence.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I never tire, I'm just sitting for fun.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Oh, very well.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm not in the mood.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'd rather not.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Like I care.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hmph. Fine. I get the point.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You'll never hear me say this again, but I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I suppose you detest me now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I will contemplate apologizing.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Do my ears deceive me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I KNOW you're not talking to ME.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll do you a favor and pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You have three seconds to take that back.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Fine. Sorry. Whatever.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, okay. Relax. Sheesh.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You MUST be joking.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Are you still talking?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Excuse me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I'm always up to no good!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sheesh, don't be so uptight.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Geez. So harsh.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I don't even know why I'm saying this, but sorry.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't like jokes.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How DARE you speak to me like this!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yeah, I know.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm impossible to resist.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I suppose you're tolerable.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How DARE you.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do that. Just don't.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You and me both, buddy.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Another adoring fan.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I suppose I ought to say thanks, but instead I'll say: SCRAM.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You have to do better than that.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do I look that gullible?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Really, now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Don't speak. Just don't.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Message received. Move on.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: That's nice.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're kidding yourself if you think you have a chance with me.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Have you looked in a mirror lately?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Don't make me laugh!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I suppose I could.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Very well.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: How refreshing.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh, fine.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Beg pardon?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you mental?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You must be kidding.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now clean it up. Use your hands.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ah, much better.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Enjoy the show?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: But why?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You first, buddy.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Oh, come on.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Forget it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: How refreshing.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Clean it up! Chop, chop!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Poop happens.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Great. Now I'm hungry.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Some things you just don't do in public.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're not even going to bribe me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Read my lips: NO.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You disgust me.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Watch my back.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good night, then.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Not sleepy.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't know if you can tell, but I'm rolling my eyes.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I'll keep going.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Stand watch. Or else.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't feel like it.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You think you can just tell me what to do?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What's in it for me?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't you dare wake me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Good night and good riddance.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do you have any idea what time it is?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: But I'll have nightmares about your face.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Your stench is too strong. Can't fall asleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You really think you can make me?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I can spend hours thinking of ways to make people cry.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There's nothing more satisfying than an evil deed done well.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The weather annoys me. Change it.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not in the mood.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't talk to me.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: "Talk." Happy? Now shut your trap.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I enjoy traveling. Why else do you think I let you hang around?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I enjoy food. So feed me.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes, I wonder where I came from.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Talk to someone who cares.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If I wanted to talk, I'd talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I want to lock all the people I despise into a dark, windowless room.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Big Headward has an awfully large head for such a small brain.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Some creatires are so ugly, I don't know how they can stand to look in the mirror

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: That Wonky the Fairy'll eat anything. I've tested it.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm the silent but deadly type.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Can't you entertain yourself?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I desire solitude. Shoo.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: That has a weird aftertaste.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Hey, that's pretty tasty.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Enough already.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: s2
string.value: Watch your tongue!

string.name: s3
string.value: Try to keep it classy, will you?

string.name: s4
string.value: Mind your manners. You embarrass me.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: (Pretends not to hear.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Ookyu, gotta rest now.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Pyoo, this feels comfortable.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Should we rest a bit?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Pyoo, let's a rest a little!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm still up and kicking, ookyu!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I want to play more...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Let's walk around more!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to play more!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I'm tired now...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Let's rest a bit!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ookyu, let's rest a little!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Pyoo! My fins are sore...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Let's walk around more!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Don't we still have a long way to go?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't want to rest right now...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Pyoo? (Pretends to not hear.)

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ookyu! So comfy! Comfy comfy!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Pyoo! Am I sitting down, or laying down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Pyoo? Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ookyu... I'm scared...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Byoo! (Bawling)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I hate you!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Pyoo... I miss mommy...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Pyoo... I'm sorry...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You want to fight?!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Pyoo! I hate you!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Stop it!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to leave you then!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Wahh!! I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll listen from now on...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Pyoo... I'm sorry...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hmph! I told you to treat me nicely!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Pyoo!! I'm going back to the north pole!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I can be scary too!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Pyoo pyoo!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Me likey!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo! I like it!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Wha?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ooh, that surprised me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What's going on, ookyu?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Are you messing with me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Me too!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I like it!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ookyu! You surprised me!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: (It's ignoring you...)

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Are you serious?!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh, happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ookyu? Are you still single?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I'm a healthy pet!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Whoa! I barely know you!!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Ookyu? Are you serious?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This isn't right!!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oo... kyu!! Whew...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Pyoo!! That felt nice...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Ookyu! Now's the time!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Pyoo! That was refreshing!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Tell me that AFTER you feed me!!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That's illegal here!!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No way!!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ookyu! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Pyoo, pyoo!!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Master, cover me well, okay?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ookyu! So refreshing!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Pyoo! Don't make me angry!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What if someone sees?!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you teasing me?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ookyu... so sleepy...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: *Snore* pyoo...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ookyu... mommy...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You sleep well too, master...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm want to play more!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still shining bright!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Ookyu... (Out cold.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good night, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Gotta rest up for tomorrow!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Ookyu... so tired...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You are a sleepyhead, aren't you, master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okie?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss my mommy...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ookyu... pyo... Zzzzzz...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good seals are early to bed, early to rise.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: See you tomorrow, master!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm still wide awake, see?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I guess master isn't too healthy...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why do you always tell me to sleep?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Is this going to make us closer?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Well you know, in the north pole... (It just rambles on)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I saw this weird animal in the forest... (It won't stop talking)

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ookyu... (It's ignoring you.)

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Did you call me?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ookyu... so annoying...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I wish I had some snow to lie on.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Ookyu... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I want to rest, pyoo!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I want to be alone...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Pyoo? (Pretends to not hear.)

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Pigs sure are weird! Why do their bottoms curl up like that?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu! Isn't it hard walking on two legs, master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where are we going today? Anywhere's fine with me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What should we eat for dinner? I want some yummy milk!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Ookyu? Are you bored?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Pyoo? What did you say?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Tell me tomorrow, okay?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like opening my mouth... too much work...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Byoo! Yeah master, go master!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo pyoo! (It seems to be singing.)

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ookyu ookyu, pyoo! Ookyu ookyu, pyoo!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I don't know any tricks...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: But I'm shy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Ookyu... how annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You show me something first, master!

string.value: Itsy bitsy seals and penguins, dancing at north pole!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Twinkle twinkle mommy star!

string.value: Three seals in a house, daddy seal, mommy seal, and baby seal!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Rings around the snowsies!

string.value: Pyoo! No way...

string.value: You want your pet to show its talents?

string.value: Give me some food first...

string.value: Ookyu, I'm full...

string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.value: Baa baa!

string.value: (Pretends to be indifferent.)

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.value: (It sits down quietly.)

string.name: c4_s4

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You are so UN-caring. Baa.

string.name: c6_f4

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f4

string.value: What a happy day!

string.name: c12_f3
