string.value: I'm a good little star!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Look, I'm sitting!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Don't order me around...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: (You've been ignored.)

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Hm? What?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is me sitting down!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Break time!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You should sit down too!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you ordering me around?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Let's rest a bit!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: You care about me, right?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: (Ignoring you) Look over there!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: (Looks at you quietly.)

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Don't sit just anywhere!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Pyo! Ron!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scaring me...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm scared...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You're going too far!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Stop it!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Can you stop being irritating?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Sorry, it was my fault.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Pyoron...can you forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Settle down!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Stop this right now!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Stop...You're scaring me...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I messed up too...sorry...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm feeling great!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You sure are nice!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Good good good!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Are you dying?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You should reconsider...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm happy!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're such an awesome master...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahem. Don't do that.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ah, you must be lonely...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That's no good...

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: First things first!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Why are you so rude?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Where are your manners!?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Huff puff...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: No! That's not it!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That's so stupid!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Try it!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You've humiliated me!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: This isn't it...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: (Already asleep.)

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: (Looks peaceful)

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I want to play more...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still up!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Stars don't sleep... I think.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: (Falls into a deep sleep.)

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Goodnight, master... zzz...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm turning out the lights...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Pyoron...(fell asleep)

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I want to play more...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Let's play a little more!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Not sleepy!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Moon's coming up...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Today was a great day...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Early bird catches the worm!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I'm still shining bright!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: But we're outside!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pyoron! Aren't I pretty?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Stars make very little noise...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Later! Much later.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: My throat hurts...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Whew, let's catch our breath...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: (Starwing got quiet.)

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You bored? I'm not.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Not now, maybe later.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Around and around!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Aren't I awesome?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Pyoron... (It looks confused.)

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: No, I don't have it.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Individuality? Is that a candy?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm tired right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Pyoron! Cool, right?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Let's dance together!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Maybe next time...

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Let's take a break

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Looks delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm stuffed!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Thank you for the food!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I can't eat anymore...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yay! Time to eat!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: s3
string.value: You should be sorry!

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey, what are you saying!?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Sure, my wings are tired.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Landed too hard. Bruised my butt.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I could use a rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Whew, what a day!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No thanks. Sometimes when I try to sit, I trip.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Nah, I'm good.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I prefer to fly, thanks.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: But why?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Well, I guess I could use a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you look at that view! Beautiful world we live in, general.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sit with me? We can discuss our adventuring strategies, general.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew, I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: But we still have a lot further to go!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: To be honest, it's not that easy for me to sit down.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Nah, don't feel like it.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Hmm? Did you say something?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll just snuggle here next to you, general.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, good. I needed to groom my wings anyway.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Hey, how about a snack?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whatever you say, boss.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: No rest for the wicked!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: My wings need exercise. They're getting pudgy!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Not yet, general!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Who, ME?! Couldn't be!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Please don't hit me! Are you going to hit me?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You're scary when you're mad.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I think I'm gonna cry!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You don't mean that.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: This is animal abuse!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: When I hum to myself, I can't hear you.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're not yourself, general.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: So scary...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You just might make me angry for the first time in my life.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Aw, don't be like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Think before you speak, general!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't point fingers, general.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Be nice to me! Please! I'm sorry!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm sorry. Really, really sorry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Sniff, sniff, sniffle.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You... You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Don't be rude, general!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop it! Shush!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Don't be so melodramatic, general.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Neigh! Neighhh!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: You're my general, baby!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Y-you're scaring me!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't hurt me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I love CARROTS, not you.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I can't hear you.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I'd follow you anywhere, general!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yay! Yaaeeighhh!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy I could fly, except I'm scared of heights.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Shucks, you're making me blush.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'm not listening.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: But I'm a self-reliant adventurer!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do you have to say that in such a creepy voice?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just keep galloping. Just keep galloping.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I love you, too, general!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh, happy day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the strongest, bestest person I know.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I think you're just swell.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Can you stop, please?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: It's not me, it's you.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone right now.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Look over there! Ahhh.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh! I feel much better now! Neigh!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: No way!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: What? In front of you?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oooof. Been saving that one.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'll try not to lose my balance and fall in this time.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hey, it's orange! Just like my favorite food, carrots!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Now I'm hungry again.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: An adventurer never poops in public!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: General! Please!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That wouldn't be polite.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Y-you're scaring me!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Whoops, is that a brown speck on my wing?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Does the texture look a little off to you?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Quick! Make sure no one's peeking!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Oh, baby. OH, BABY!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go right now.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What if someone sees?!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You're MEAN!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do I have to?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: This is how I snore: zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I AM awfully drowsy.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't mind if I do.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I could use a quick little nappy nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: A true adventurer never rests! Right?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: When I close my eyes, it gets dark, and I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But what if monsters get me?!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I think you just want an excuse to nap.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of carrots!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't let anyone hurt me, mmkay?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I never tire!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleep? ALREADY?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: But what if I get nightmares?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You sleep, general. I'll stand guard.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Can you buy me a stuffed carrot to hug?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Keep me secret, keep me safe, general.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't keep my eyes open. Zzzzzeigh.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: But I just downed an energy drink!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Are you saying I'm weak?!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: But I'm not sleeeepy!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No! I want to have an adventure!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I was born for adventure!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Carrots are amazing! They're nutritious, orange, pointy...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I lick my wings to keep them clean, just like a kitten.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If you have a heart of courage, the world is your carrot!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm daydreaming. Shhh!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Hmm? What? Huh?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want to be alone right now, please.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Can you go away, please?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes people call me a unicorn, so I tried tying a carrot on my head.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My second favorite thing in the world? Carrots. My first favorite thing? YOU!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I want to be just like you when I grow up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Where should we adventure to next, general? I can't wait!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm too tired to chat.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Action over words, general!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: We're too busy to talk right now!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Later! Later!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I trip over my own feet sometimes, but I won't let that stop me!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, my wings get tangled up in each other and I fall on my face.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm brave, general? I really hope you do.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What's your favorite? Deep-fried carrot, carrot steak, or carrot stew?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm tired of talking.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We should save our energy for our adventures!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not good at small talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But I want to hear about YOUR adventurers, general!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Okay! Watch...THIS!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Heh, not everyone can pull THIS off.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Hold on to your hats, ladies and gents!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Hehe, can YOU do this?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm an adventurer, not a circus performer!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: But I'm shy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No, thank you.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm tired!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Think I deserve a carrot for this, general?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Amazing, isn't it?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Let's see a unicorn try to pull this off.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This comes in real handy for an explorer like me.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have my dignity!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Not in the mood. Sorry.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, please.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Hey! Be nice!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Ah, that hit the spot!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Neigh, I'm full...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ah, scrumptious! Thanks!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Hey, I'm a colt, not a pig!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Perfect timing, general. I'm starving!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Ugh, I overate!

string.name: s2
string.value: General! An adventurer ought to know better!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm disappointed in you, general.

string.name: s4
string.value: Do you see the disappointment in my eyes, general?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Like this? Squerch.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Good? Squerch.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'll sit here. Squerch.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? I'll try. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What? Squerch.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Not paying attention. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't understand. Squerch.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: It's too nasty here. Squerch.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Like this?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Did I do well?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting is easy!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want food.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: You talk funny.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: As you command!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's easy being a pet...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way I'm sitting

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I won't do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy Can't hear you

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You scare me. Squerch...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Scary face! Hide! Squerch!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll be good Squerch...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I let you down... Squerch...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Stop saying that! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: So... sorry...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'm scared...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Here we go

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I just can't win!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll be careful now, master.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ah... master, your words hurt!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master, please forgive me...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Oh... that was good. Squerch...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Smelly! Squerch.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! Squerch.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It...it's stuck... Squerch...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I pooped before! Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That's going to stain

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Eehhh... Eeyaaaah!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Oh my... it smells

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't make me!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I feel much better.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: While everyone is watching me?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master! You poop instead!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I love you too! Squerch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hehe... I'm blushing. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks! Squerch.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Me too. Squerch.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Liar Squerch.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What did you say? Squerch.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Since when? Squerch?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Aww Me too, master!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Really? Thanks, master!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I think you're really awesome!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I love food.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Right back atcha master!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Liar liar pants on fire.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master's talking gibberish again...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Like this? Squerch.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You like my smile? Squerch.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Hehehe! Squerch.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't I look good? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't have time. Squerch...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you think, master?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Haha, like this?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You first.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Oh alright How about that?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Aren't I beautiful?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Hehehe, smile with me master!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I have a killer smile!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not in the mood.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: No smiling for me, thanks.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Please don't say that... Squerch.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Whyyy? Squerch!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: That was harsh. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Look who's talkin'. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm getting mad now! Squerch!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aaaand now I'm pissed. Squerch.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Take it back! Squerch!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master I can't believe you said that

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke right? Right?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You... didn't mean that

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: You would know!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Take that back!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hurts every time

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Say something nice now. Please?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'm all you've got.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm hungry, really hungry. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you Squerch

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm not a radio. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I need rest.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Food first, talking second.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I hope you level-up today!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Have you been working out?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Talking's for the fishes.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I thought we just talked

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Cute, right? Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You obviously don't mean it.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Check out my power! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Too much cute squerch...

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Not this time. Squerch.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: You know you love me!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: My eyes are closing squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: You sleep! Squerch!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Feed me! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: ...you... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Master, I just slept!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse...

string.name: c18_f4

string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c20_s4

string.value: Scram. I'm so not in the mood.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: No comment.

string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered with you at the moment. Zzzz.

string.value: I heart you, Master!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's fantastic being with you...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.value: You are so boring me right now.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Pink!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm liking you more and more with each passing day.

string.name: c22_f2

string.value: Too tired for that.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I peed just before...bark...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shhhhh! Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew...almost peed on myself...woof...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Whoa, I aimed it wrong...woof...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sorry...don't feel like peeing yet...woof...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...peeing is reserved for bathrooms...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shhh....arrrrrgh, I stepped on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I won't do it...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Can YOU pee on purpose?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Nah... soo itchy... woof

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who's your favorite celebrity?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You talk, and I'll listen.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Like this, right? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well...right? Right?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, master

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: No! Imma wander around!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I ain't doing that...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Whoa! I'm tall! Woof!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: That's too hard!! Woof woof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No...! WOOF!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it...woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Hehe...master, am I doing well?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Woot! Whoa, that's pretty high..

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Wo...woof woof!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Me too! bark bark!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Stop! I'm blushing! bark bark

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Thanks...bark!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Hehe...me too...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What? Bark bark?

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Feed me first...bark...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, me too! woof woof!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I feel good...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Eh?? Woof...?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Master...I'm blushing...

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hehe! I feel goooooood!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.value: Bark! bark bark bark!

string.value: FOOD!! FOOD!!! Woof woof...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: c5_f2

string.value: Fun! Is fun!

string.value: Me am kr'ishmor, Mr'aku!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Gra, unar!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.value: W-why you say?

string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.value: I talked.

string.value: I'm gonna talk.

string.value: My name Ipos.

string.value: I make many fights.

string.value: I am speed-demon boy!

string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: More! More!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are toughest Mr'kuma ever!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Gryaaawn. Whatever.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You try to be funny?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.value: W-why you say?

string.value: W-why you say?

string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: W-why you say?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No! Food! Eat many food!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Ha! Pthbbbtt!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Poona drakla!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Oh...gra drakla.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Rak! Drakla m'raktoom!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.value: Make fire from bottom area!

string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.value: I empty belly already!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Drakla stuck. Bottom much itchy.

string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You have weird enjoyments, Mr'aku.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No rest for wicked!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I talked.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna talk.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm a devil.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm doing it right now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My name Fose.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I make many hallucinations.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am speed-demon boy!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: True devil power!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I no perform like kr'grana.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That very personal...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.value: What a pleasant scent.

string.value: Is good, Mr'kuma.
